360a3(pi): gagasang sngags rgyud kyi dam tshig ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya// 'jig rten skyes pa thams cad la// brnyas pa nyid du mi byed pa// rdo rje thabs kyi dam tshig yin//
360a4(pi): las las byung ba'i 'jig rten ni// bud med brnyas par mi byed pa// rdo rje shes rab dam tshig yin// las kyi rigs dang yum gyi rigs// 'di ltar shes nas ma nyams na//
360a5(pi): rdo rje sku yi dam tshig ldan// phan dang gnod pa'i bsam pa yis// sems kyis sems can dga' bar skyong // yi chad sun par mi byed pas// rdo rje thugs kyi dam tshig yin// /
360a6(pi): rdzun dang phra ma tshig rtsub dang // nam yang smra bar mi byed dang // snyan par smra bar byed pa ni// rdo rje ngag gi dam tshig yin// dri chen dri chu byang chub sems// maM sa rak+ta
360a7(pi): rgyal ba lngas// mnyam nyid rtogs phyir dam tshig ste// blang dor spang bar mi bya phyir// 'di ni rtog pa'i dam tshig yin// dam du bcas te 'dod lha la// mchod dang gtor
360b1(pi): ma rab tu btson// gsang ba bsrung ba'i dam tshig ste// dam tshig kun gyi rtsa ba yin// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste
360b2(pi): bzhi pa'o// // de nas gsang sngags sgrub 'dod pas// bzlas pa'i thabs kyang bstan par bya// dang por gsang sngags gang 'dzin pa/
360b3(pi): dkon mchog gsum dang yi dam can// slob dpon bla ma'i drung du ni// dam tshig sdom pa sngon du bya// yi ge mang nyung bzlas pa gang // dang por cung zad brjod pa yin//
360b4(pi): de nas ldabs te gdon par bya// de nas kyang ni cher byung nas// ldabs te brjod pa kho nar bya// de bzhin ldabs te zhabs su ni// de yi bdag nyid kho na ste// khams
360b5(pi): mi bde dang ma snyoms med// bar chod dag dang med pa'i tshul// de ltar bzlas pas de sgoms na// las gzhan 'jug par mi 'dod de// bzlas pa'i tshul kyang 'di ltar
360b6(pi): bzlas// thams cad myur min bul ba spangs// yi ge drag zhan rnam par byed// yan lag sgra dang bcas pa tshang // A li kA li'i nang du chud// sems dpa'
360b7(pi): gsum gyi tshul brjod pas// drag tu gzhan gyis mi thos par// bdag nyid kyis kyang lhag mi thos// mgo ni rma bya bzhin bkug ste// sems ni sa ltar brtan byas la//
361a1(pi): ngag ni thos med rdo rje bzlas// 'di ni bzlas pa kun gyi gzhi// thogs med bzlas pa 'di yis ni// yi ge bzhi pa'i dngos grub thob/ 'pha
361a2(pi): ba rin po che dpung rgyun gyi rgyud las/ bzlas pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// nag po chen po'i dum bu dang po rdzogs so//
361a3(pi): / dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ba ni// mthing nag gru gsum khru gang yin// srid du yang ni mtho do pa// sor mo brgyad 'phags rim pa gsum// rdo rje dang
361a4(pi): ni thod pa dang // de bzhin khrag gi rgya mtsho ste// steng na gri gug yod pa'o// hUM ni gri gug lte ba la// gnas pa gzhi de nag po ste// sna tshogs rdo rje de dbus yin//
361a5(pi): phyogs dang mtshams rnams dur khrod dag/ mdzes par byas nas bkod pa'i steng // sngon du bstan pa de nyid yin// sa ni dur khrod dag nas blangs// shi ba'i khrag gis
361a6(pi): rnam brdzis la// dpa' ba'i sems kyis dkyil 'khor brtsig/ dmar po khrag dang nag po ni// dur khrod sol ba yang dag ste// gri gug kyang ni thal ba'i mdog/ 'phags
361a7(pi): pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gtor ma gtang ba ni// gtor ma'i rgyu dang de sbyang dang /
361b1(pi): sngags dang phyag rgya'i khyad par gyis// bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas ni// kun tu gtong dang gtong ba tshe// gtong ba med pa'i bsam gtan bya// dang po hUM las gyur pa
361b2(pi): ni// cho 'phrul rdzogs las skur bskyed de// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa dang // dbu la sangs rgyas lnga ldan zhing // sems dpa'i skyil mo bgying ba'i lha// brtags nas bskyed
361b3(pi): pa'i 'og tu yang // rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// oM dkar AHdmar hUM mthing nag/ spyi bo lce dang snying kha dag/ yang dag byin brlabs sku gsung thugs//
361b4(pi): rnam par ldan pa'i bdag po yin// de yi gtor ma bskyed pa ni// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kha yaM dmar po raM// dkar po a dag snang ba yin// pad+ma ban d+ha snod kyi dbying//
361b5(pi): nya dang chang dang 'bras chen dang // me tog dang ni bdug pa dang // la d+hu la phug sbrang rtsi dang // sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga yis ni// nag po chen po mchod par bya// rlung gis zla
361b6(pi): gam pa dan las// yaM gis sa bon spros te bskul// 'bud pa'i stobs kyis me sbar te// pad+ma ban d+ha dros pa las// nang gi dam rdzas zhu ba yis// bdud rtsi sbyang phyir rdo rjes
361b7(pi): bkrus// rtog par bya phyir a yis brtag/ 'dod pa 'phel phyir oM gyis byed// bzlas pa'i rim pa gtor ma'i sngags// oM mahA kA la ya/ sha sa na a pa ra ha ri e shang / sa
362a1(pi): pas ci ma ka lo yang / i dam ma 'dus sha dz+yAta pa ha pa b+hi laM dA dA/ mi rad na tra ya/ a ba ra ka ri naM/ ya ti pra ti dz+nyArma/ ra si ta tha i daM ma ma dum+b+ha
362a2(pi): sha hUM/ ta ba 'bar la mi dang kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mA ra mA ra g+h+rin g+hi na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ da ha de he/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ni me ga na hUM phaT/ 'di dag gtor ma chen po ste// ci phyir dang po'i
362a3(pi): 'od zer gyis// sems can thams cad bskul sbyangs te// 'od zer dag la thim pa'o// de nas bdag nyid chen po yi// rdo rje'i lce la btang ba dang // bza' btung la
362a4(pi): sogs kun kyang yin// kun tu gtong bar 'dod pa ni// sngags ni 'di dag rnams dang ldan// bzlas nas kun gyis thos par 'gyur// oM a ra li ho dzA hUM baM ho//
362a5(pi): badz+ra DA ki da ya/ yo ki ni shri sa ma stau/ tri sha ho/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ a kha ro mu khaM sarba d+harma/ ar+ya nud pan na tAd ta au AHhUM/ dmigs pa sgo dang khyab pa sbyi// thams
362a6(pi): cad sdigs ni rab ldan yang // rang gi 'khor la 'dis btang bya// oM in+d+ra ya ma/ dza la/ yak+ShA/ b+hu ta ba h+ni/ ba yu/ na ga/ tsan+na/ sur+ya/ ma ta baM ba ta la pa ta le/
362a7(pi): a ta sam pa/ swA hA/ i daM ba bun dza/ dzi ga d+hu pa/ puSh+pa/ d+hi pa/ gan+d+he ba ra swA hA/ 'di ni kun tu gtong ba ste// ci phyir de ni kun tu gtong // mchod dang gtor ma
362b1(pi): kun tshang bas// kha yod pa dang gdong pa yod// mdor na chos can thams cad dang // sangs rgyas dang ni sems can kun// bdag nyid thugs kha'i sa bon las// 'phros
362b2(pi): pa dang pos rnam par sbyangs// gnyis pas 'dir 'dus thams cad 'ongs// 'od zer gsum pas rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams su gyur pa'i lces// rdo rje sbu gus
362b3(pi): bdud rtsi drang // bsod nams ye shes tshang ba 'di// dge ba'i zhing mchod kun kyang tshim// de phyir kun tu gtong ba yin// gtor ma'i lta ba 'dod rnams la// gtor ma'i
362b4(pi): lta ba bstan pa ni// gtong ba med pa'i gtor ma ste// ci phyir 'di nyid gtong ba med// de ni lta ba shes phyir ro// gang phyir ban d+ha snod kyi dbyibs// yum ni 'jig rten
362b5(pi): phyi yi snod// khyab pa nam mkha'i rgya dang 'dra// bcud ni gtor ma ye shes dag/ bdud rtsi'i ro mchog byang chub sem// skye ba med pa'i ngo bo ni// bdud rtsi dkar por
362b6(pi): gyur pa yin// sems can sangs rgyas kun yin pas// de phyir gzhan la mchod byed su// de la blang dor med bzhin du// bya dang byed pa rtog pa gang // mi g.yo ba yi
362b7(pi): dngos po ni// thams cad pad+ma ban d+ha ste// g.yo ba rnams kyi ngo bo ni// thams cad bdud rtsi byang chub sems// gnyis su med phyir rnam par dag/ snod ni chos dbyings
363a1(pi): rnam par dag/ bcud ni ye shes rnam par dag/ de phyir dbyings dang ye shes ni// chos sku bde ba chen po la// so sor 'byed pa'i rmongs pa
363a2(pi): rnams// lta ba med pas 'khyams par 'gyur// gang zhig gtor ma'i lta ba yod// de yis gtong ba chen po dang // kun tu gtong ba brjod na yang // mkhas pa de ni don rnams
363a3(pi): thob// de la phyag rgya ston par bya// lag gnyis thal sbyar phyir bkye da la// mtheb mo gcig tu bkrus pa dang // mdzub mo 'khyud pa'athur du bkug/ gung rje sprad mdzan
363a4(pi): chung sbeng // srin lag gnyis ni nang du dgug/ de phyir gtor ma'i thad du bcas// ma hA mu tra'i las byed do// dam tshig bdud rtsi sbyang ba dang // ye shes bdud rtsi dgug
363a5(pi): pa ni// gtor ma mkhan gyi cho ga yin// thams cad gtor mas dngos grub 'thob// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ gtor ma'i cho ga bstan pa ste le'u
363a6(pi): bdun pa'o// // de nas drag po'i man ngag ni// mkhas pa la ni sbyin sreg bstan// bla ma la ni gus par bya// bsgrub bya'i rnam smin 'bum du
363a7(pi): byin// gru gsum rim nang stong can// mi yi sa bon nang du'o// dbus su bsgrub bya de bzhin sngags// 'gro ba la ni gzugs dang sngags// yi ge bcu pa mtha' yas tshang //
363b1(pi): klad pa'i nang du 'jug pa'i rlung // dpral bar shes rab ye shes te// brten pa la ni dag pa yod// thabs kyi ri la thabs kyi sgo// shes rab kyi ni ri la yang // mtha' lnga'i/
363b2(pi): drung nas blang bar bya// srid pa dbu ma rin 'byung gi/ ming ni yang dag 'brel ba yin// ming thob dbang po pho dang mo// snying po'i ming dang yang dag ldan// rlung gi dkyil
363b3(pi): 'khor gnyis pa yang // bzhi pa'i sgo yis mdzes pa'o// srid par 'dzin pa byed pa yi// chags sdang dbus na kun gyi gzhi// rang bzhin 'gyur med thig le gnas// 'bum phrag
363b4(pi): kun kyang 'di 'dra'o// 'od zer rgya ma'am rkyen gang yin// spu dang tsher ma og shol can// ci rigs sbyar bas de sbar bya'o// de yi 'bras bu de nyid kyi// me tog mchod
363b5(pi): pa yang dag yin// de dang rnam smin re rer ldan// phyi nag nang ser zla ba'adra// las bzhi'i mtshan nyid yod pa can// zur gsum gnam lcags rtse mo 'dra// bye'u
363b6(pi): yi mchu 'dra nag mo dang // gzugs kyi tha chungs nag mo dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu mi 'dra ba'i// sa bon nag po gzhan yang shis// de 'dra'i nang gi nga rgyal can// lce
363b7(pi): yi sdug bsngal skyed byed pa// de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu 'ja// thams cad yang dag mchod pa yin// khyad par gsang sngags 'di dang ldan// oM ma hA kA la ya/ sarba sha tru/
364a1(pi): ru ba da ha da ha/ pa tsa ba tsa/ di na me ke na hUM phaT/ yi ge bcu pa sngon 'gro zhing // bsreg pa'i dus su bsreg pa'i sngags// re re la yang re rer ldan//
364a2(pi): sngags ni mang la ling ka nyung // ling ka mang la sngags ni nyung // thams cad nyes par bshad pa ste// 'di ni nges par mi rung ngo // re re la yang re rer ldan// de nyid dam
364a3(pi): tshig yin par bshad// de bas sbyin sreg grub par 'gyur// grangs ni tha ma 'bum du bshad// 'bring ni bye ba sa ya rab// dpa' bos yang dag sgrub par byos// me
364a4(pi): pra rtags kyi mtshan nyid ni// gzugs dang kha dog sgra dang dri// du da pa tsha tsha mtho dman gyi// rtags ni rab tu bshad par bya// gzugs ni glang po 'dra ba yi// khro bo'i dbu skra dang yang mtshug//
364a5(pi): beng gi gzugs 'dra gru bzhi pa// 'phra la ring ba phyag mtshan gcad// gru gsum ho khung dang yang 'dra// mi yi gzugs dang 'dra ba 'byung // mgo bo'i mtshan ma chad pa/
364a6(pi): yin// sngo skya ser nag dmar na lam// ljang nag du da kha stag zil mdog/ char sprin mdog 'a dra hral hral po// sprin med nam mkha'i snying po 'dra// ldang ser
364a7(pi): dmar skya 'khyug la 'khyil// nub kyi dmar thag chad bzhin snang // smug nag dmar la gsal ba'i mdog/ shog sgra snyan dang sa 'brug skad// 'khor lo bskor ba lta
364b1(pi): bu'i sgra// rtag sgra tsheg tsheg smra ba dang // spa yi sgra'adra wab kyang 'dra// brdebs pa'i sgra dang dkrol ba'i sgra// bud pa dang ni nga ro ste// ngu ba dang ni rgod pa dang // 'bod
364b2(pi): pa dang ni 'khun pa'i skad// 'jug dang gnas dang 'byung ba'i rlung // bla rnams gang yang 'grub pa'i tshig/ sgrog pa sregs pa lta bu dang // ldong ros tshig 'ja rje si dz+r-i/
364b3(pi): 'byung po tshig pa yin par bshad// mi sha bsregs dang gzhob kyi rje// bdug la dri rtsub ba babs// dgra bo gsod pa'i dri dang ldan// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ tsan dan
364b4(pi): dang ni spos kyi dri// lha rnams byon pa'i dri dang ldan// dud pas mi gsal 'khyil pa dang // 'tshubs la thibs pas drang ba che// drag po'i mtshan ma tshang ba yi// tsha tsha 'phro ba
364b5(pi): zhabs su mang // bsgrub bya'i phyogs su rnam par 'thor// me stag che ba yang dag shis// gyen du mchong ba 'dra ba dang // me stag kha phru btab pa 'dra// mtho la drag pa'i
364b6(pi): khyal bar ni// gnam du 'bar ba gyen du 'gro// 'thur du lhung zhing gyen du 'khyil// thab khung nang du thim nas ni// yang ni gnam du 'thor bar 'bar// 'di ni me yi rtags
364b7(pi): bdun pa// mkhas pas bla ma la bris te// brtson pas yang dag yang sbyor ba// de yi lus rnams de yis byos// me yi phyogs na me lha 'dug/ me ni 'jig rten khyad par bya// lha ni
365a1(pi): dbus su spyan drangs te// las rnams byed pa bdag gis kyang // 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ drag po sbyin sreg bstan pa ste
365a2(pi): le'u brgyad pa'o// // de nas dang po'i tsha ba'i nad// bsregs te gsad par bya ba yin// gro ma chu 'gram phung ba'i sa// bsgrub bya'i gzugs ni khru
365a3(pi): gang ba// tsha ba'i 'bru dang 'dra// tsha 'bras sbyin pa gnyer ma can// tsha ba bskyed pa shing gi rigs// 'bras bu dmar po skye ba'i rtse// yun la thung ba gnyer ba'i rtse//
365a4(pi): 'bras bu sgyur la khur ser rtse// yun can seng ge'i mche ba 'dra// zur gsum zug du'i 'bras bu nyid// gzhan yang 'di 'dra mang bshad de// rnam smin nang du dgang bar
365a5(pi): bya// de yi rnam smin reg bya la// yungs mar dang bsres bskus pa la// de yi shing gi me sbar nas// ha cang mi drag dal bas bsro// dros par gyur na dmar ba'o// de yi 'bras bu
365a6(pi): tsha bas mchi// gal te de yis ma byung na// sngon gyi sbyor bas brtsam par bya// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ bsgrub bya'i gzugs bsro ba'i thabs tsha ba nad
365a7(pi): kyis gsad pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// // rnal 'byor drag po'i spyod pa ni// mtshan byed dag na sra ba shig ste// gcer bu thal bas byugs pa ni// kha T+wAM grol ba
365b1(pi): gar thabs yin// rnam snang mdzad kyis byugs pa dang // mtshan ma gyen du bsgreng ba yis// don yod grub pa gang thabs byed// bskor dang bskor ba chen po yi// phyag rgya ro yi steng du
365b2(pi): byed// ha ha zhes ni lce yang 'byin// rin chen 'byung ldan yang dag za// rdo rje sems dpa' mchod par 'bul// snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin te// rta mchog rus pa'i steng na
365b3(pi): 'dug/ ma mo'i tshogs rnams sdud par byed// dur rnams su yang 'gro bar byed// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ nag po chen po'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste
365b4(pi): bcu pa'o// // de nas mgon po nag po nyid// rab tu khros te sngags 'di brjod// yab yum rnam par gyur pas 'jigs// oM badz+ra yak+Sha de ba ma hA kA la
365b5(pi): kro d+ha hUM dzA dzA dzA/ bcu drug gsang sngags 'di nyid ni// thams cad 'dzin par gyur pa la// tshogs bdag chen po'i sngags rnams bstan// oM badz+ra yak+Sha de ba/ ma hA yak+Sha ma/ be ti/
365b6(pi): la dzA dzA dzA/ sngags ni bcu bdun gang 'dzin pa// pe ta li dang yang dag ldan// g.yon du 'khril ba yum gyi tshul// rang sems rdzogs pa'i lha yi sku// rnam par bzlas pas
365b7(pi): 'grub pa yin// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ yab yum gyi gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang sgrub
366a1(pi): pa ni// gnam lcags phur ba ru sbal gyi// rma bya'i g.yon khrag bskus pa gzas zin tshe// mgo la btab na gnam lcags 'bab// rtag tu phyis
366a2(pi): ni phung ba'i mchog/ dud 'gro sna yi pho nya ni// bsgrub bya'i sgra gzugs bris pa la// sbrul gyi steng du phung bar 'gyur// mgul pa brdegs pa de nyid la// ma hA b+h+yo zhes ldan pa sgrub//
366a3(pi): gang gi zhing la btab na srin// 'bu la sogs pas za bar byed// 'thab byed gnyen po'i sbyor ba ni// gnyis ka la yang de bzhin te// mig la sgrub bya mchu la bsngags// dri ma
366a4(pi): can gyi mtshan mo la// gzhan ni de bzhin nyi ma la'o// thams cad phung bar 'thab pa'i mchog/ tshul khrims can gyi mgo gcad la// zla ba phyed pa'i mtshan mo ni// sngag
366a5(pi): su 'dug pa'i bskul tshig can// shes kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas rmi// dran byed brjed ngas snying la ni// gshegs pa'i nang du sgrub bya gzhug/ le brgan lce 'dra'i khar
366a6(pi): bcug ste// bzlas pa thebs na zor 'phangs skyo// ci cu'i nang du sgrub bya can// zabs la mkhas par khar bcug ste// gsang sngags rdzogs na nges par 'chi// tshad pa'i
366a7(pi): rnam smin snying la ni// bsgrub sngags bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan// phyogs su bltas na myur du 'ong // lha mo klu yang de yis bod// rin chen 'bar ba de bris rdul// sngags dang
366b1(pi): bskul tshig yang dag ldan// 'dod na nor rnams myur du 'ong // dud la rlung gi rkang pa la// steng du yang las de steng ming // bskul tshig ldan na srod par 'gyur// ma yi khang pa'i
366b2(pi): nang du ni// gsod byed ma yi dbang po lnga// de yi dbus na klu yi phyugs// de yi nang na bskul tshig gis// lo tog 'joms pa'i chu glang yin// rnam par blun pe lce ni ni// bsgrub
366b3(pi): bya'i ming ldan za byed kha// mi shel blangs te mnan pa lkugs// 'ug pa bya rog sha pa khyi// byi ba byil sre mong sprul// rtsa la ni mang bsdus de de yin// tsher ma sa me shel bzlog pa ni
366b4(pi): de ni myur du rengs pa yis// byol song khyim nas longs spyod blang // rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas gser blangs te// rgyal po bcugs pa'i gzugs byas te// chu dkar gtsang ma la
366b5(pi): sogs mchod// bskul tshig ldan pa'i sngon du bsnyen// ldan na char yang yang dag 'bab// 'bras kyi phub ma bsregs nas na// zhi ba'i sems kyi bskul tshig ldan// thams cad
366b6(pi): gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur// mngal na 'jug pa'i 'byung po la// 'dod khams bdag po'i mtshan ma ni// rdzas la de 'dra'i gzugs byas te// lung pa sa de yul bya// nang du
366b7(pi): bcug pa'i bskul tshag gis// mngal gyi nang nas dros par 'gyur// brang gi mtshon cha can de la// mid pa skad kyi ma ning snying // bzhag ste bskul na nam yang gnon// chu ni
367a1(pi): snyim pa du ma bsnams// blangs te yang dang yang gtor na// bskul tshig ldan pas me yang 'chi// mun pa'i nang na gter gyis// de yi gzugs/
367a2(pi): la de 'dra bri// byu ru sdong po zhon pa de// sngags dang ting 'dzin rab ldan bskul// myur du gzhan gyi bran du 'gro// sgrib med 'pho bo'i skad cig ma// nus pa srungs can thal
367a3(pi): bal// rngo stengs brdal ba'i de ming bri// rlung gis gnan na nor dang bral// gshog pa spug nag bdud kyi sde// snying lpags med pa'i snying la za// de yi khar ni de bcug ste/
367a4(pi): shel gyi 'od zer nub na 'chi// rgod gsher gnyis las khang pa 'dra// gzhon nu'i khang pa'i thal ba la// bskul tshig sbyar na gzhon nu 'chi// de ni mo sham 'dra ba yin//
367a5(pi): dre'u khye'u gzugs ldan pa// ri bong bu ni rwa can zhon// ru sbal spu las byas pa yis// gos ni yang dag lus la dkri// nam mkha'i me tog 'thor byed pas// bud med
367a6(pi): 'khor lo sgyur rgyal bskyon// bya rog 'ug pa phaT tshun tshe// 'di ni mi 'da' brtan pa'i rgyu// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud thun mong gi dngos grub las/ phra mo'i sbyor
367a7(pi): ba brten pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // sems can rnams ni drang phyir du// rgyal bas chos nyid ston mi mdzad// ci'i phyir de ni skrag pa'i phyir//
367b1(pi): thabs kyi lam du 'dud pa yin// thabs kyi cho 'phrul gang la yang // bstan na zhi gnas thob par 'gyur// de yis lhag mthong rnyed pa yis// de phyir thabs kyi cho 'phrul ni// snying
367b2(pi): rje yod phyir rgya chen yin// rgya chen cho 'phrul thams cad la// thams cad rmad pa ma yin pas// 'jug par bya ba kho nar zad// 'di ni rgyal ba'i byin brlabs pa'i// thun mong
367b3(pi): dngos grub sgo nas kyang // 'jug pa'i rten 'brel bstan pa yin// dam pas dam chos ston pa'i tshul// gzugs kyi sgo nas ston pa dang // dgra yi sgo nas 'dren pa dang //
367b4(pi): dri dang ro dang reg pa rnams// ji ltar bas 'dul ba yin// gang dag phung po lnga dang ni// dbyibs dang kha dog rdul gyis kyang // mos pa dma' ba 'dul ba yin// sku mdog
367b5(pi): phyag mtshan gdan khri dang // bzhugs tshul la sogs bstan pa yang // mu stegs can rnams 'dul phyir ro// gdug pa'i chas mas rabs bsnams te// sgro skur btab na
367b6(pi): 'dren pa yin// kha cig rang lus phung po la// dam pa'i rigs rnams phye ste ston// de bzhin so so'i lus nyid las// rtsa yi drang ba gang yin pas// de yi sgo nas 'dren
367b7(pi): bar mdzad// gzhan yang dbul dang yi ge dang // tshig dang ming la sogs pas 'dzin// 'od gsal spos bral brjod pa med// kun gyi snal 'di ston pa// drang ba'i
368a1(pi): phyir na thabs kyi mchog/ 'di ni 'od gsal rang la yod// thog ma med nas gnas pa ste// blun po rnams kyi rtogs pas bsgribs// byang chub ji
368a2(pi): med gang thob pa// thob par bya ba rdul tsam med// thams cad sems ni mngon sangs rgya// lus ni nam kyang sangs mi rgya// gal te sems nyid sangs rgya na// de phyir lus na yod na
368a3(pi): mod// de la zhen pa gang zhig yin// thams cad mi rtag sgyu ma// snang yang sgyu ma rtag mi bzod// ma rtogs nyams dga' sgyu ma'i tshul// mi snang na yang sgyu ma zhig/ blo bur 'ongs
368a4(pi): kyang blo bur med// chu yi chu bur dang yang 'dra// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor lta bu ni// gsal la rnyog pa med pa yin// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la ni// rgyal ba lta bar mi mdzad do//
368a5(pi): sems can rnams kyi lta ba ni// 'di ltar shes pa mngon sangs rgyas// kha cig brtags pa'i dngos po las// rang sems bskyed pa lha sgom pa// brtags pa dor ba dgongs pa yod//
368a6(pi): byis pa shes nas mi 'dor na// nam kyang srin po'i skye ba blangs// rdzogs gsal ldan pa cher gnas pa// sku rdzogs spangs kyang nam kyang 'chad// rgyal ba'i rgyud kyi gtsug lag ni//
368a7(pi): dam tshig dang ni lta ba dang // sgrub pa tshang nas rgyud kyi don// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ lta ba bstan pa'o// nag po chen po'i dum bu gnyis pa'o// /
368b1(pi): / de nas bar snang gi lha rnams kyis nag po chen po la bstod pa/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad snyan pa'i bar snang la// mtshan nyid 'thun pa'i stod pa me tog shar// de dpon nag
368b2(pi): po chen po dge ba yis// sa gzhi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir bstod pa// mi 'jigs seng ge nyon mongs mtsho las rgyal// thub med dpa' yi lha min g.yul las rgyal// thub med dpa'
368b3(pi): bopo bdud dpung g.yul las rgyal// mjig 'khrul pa kun nas rnam par rgyal// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa bstod sngags khyod// gnod pa 'dul ba'i nges pa'i tshul
368b4(pi): ston khyod// skye 'a gro phal chen kun gyi skyabs gyur khyod// thugs rje'i dbang gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad khyod// dge slong dgra bcom rnams dang tshul khrims mnyam// drang srong rdigs
368b5(pi): 'dzin rnams dang dka' thub mnyam// lha dbang brgya byin rnams dang longs spyod mnyam// khro bo stobs chen rnams dang spyod pa mnyam// yun rings dka' bas 'gro ba'i don
368b6(pi): brtson 'phags// smon lam phun sum tshogs pas 'grub pa 'phags// 'dod khams bzhin du zhing khams skyong bas 'phags// rtag tu dmigs med chos la mi g.yo 'phags// /
368b7(pi): sgron ma mun sel yid bzhin 'bar ba'i bdag/ gtso bo tsam tsom med pa gsang sngags bdag/ rgyal srid 'byung ba chen po tshogs kyi bdag/ dbang bskur bskal pa bzang po srid
369a1(pi): gsum bdag/ gang tshe gcig gis 'dul bar shes pa po// ci dang ci 'dul sprul pa shes pa po// ci rigs gang dag bshad pa shes pa po//
369a2(pi): shes pa yongs shes ji bzhin shes pa po// dbang phyug chen po mthong na dga' ba'i gnas// spyod yul rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bstan pa'i gnas// des pa lha rigs phal tshogs
369a3(pi): 'byung ba'i gnas// 'jigs med 'byung ba mthong na dam tshig gnas// 'chen mchog bsgyings pa srid ltar ltung ba 'dzin// 'phong pa mi bzad srog kyang gang zhig 'dzin// /
369a4(pi): rgyal po yul 'khor bcas pa'i sbyor ba 'dzin// dbang phyug 'gying ba mchod pa don du 'dzin// bstod pa 'os panyis pa sel bar byed// 'dam rdzab sems pa 'khrul pa ni par
369a5(pi): byed// mig rtsa dmar po srin po rmugs par byed// mdog nag tshogs kyis nag po bkra shis byed// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rgyan dang bcas// spros pa yon tan mang po
369a6(pi): rgyan dang chas// sprul pa rnam pa mang po tshogs dang bcas// cis 'dul thabs kyis mtshon chas kun dang chas// dus dang sbyin pa lobs mthu stobs kyi rab// khyab 'jug
369a7(pi): brtsan po mthu stobs grub pa'i rab// gzi brjid 'bar ba bshes gnyen can gyi rab// bzhin 'dzum byang chub mchog gi lam ston rab// snying rjes 'khor ba mi stong thabs
369b1(pi): mkhas mchog/ so ldan skyon gyis mi gos ye shes mchog/ rtogs nas dad pas khyab par 'byung ba'i mchog/ nad rnams sel bar byed pa sman gyi mchog/ mtha'
369b2(pi): yas gsang sngags gzhir gyur nag po che// legs ldan nag po chen po grags pa che// lag na rtse gsum log 'dren spa bkod che// kha dog so gtsigs glang chen pags gyon
369b3(pi): che// tshogs chen yang dag rdzogs pas sangs rgyas yin// dam tshig rgyas shis cir yang bstan pa yin// khro zhing 'khor bzhi gnod pa med stobs yin// sgrib spangs
369b4(pi): dge 'dun legs par mchod pa yin// dkon mchog gtsug lag khang ni skyong bar mdzad// dge 'dun 'khor kun legs par 'phel bar mdzad// gzhon nu gzhon de kun gyis rgyas
369b5(pi): par mdzad// log 'dren dgra bgegs ma lus 'dul bar mdzad// sems can+da la phan gdags snying la bsams// dad pas mchog bskyed dga' ba 'di mthong na// sdang ba'i
369b6(pi): dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i mgon dang bcas// nad bral mthong na dga' ba'i rnam drug khyod// bsod nams dpal gyi rgyan pas rab mdzes te// tshogs bdag byin gyis grub
369b7(pi): na gnod pa sel// 'di dang pha rol gnyis kar phun sum tshogs// 'dod pa gzhan yang 'di las byung ba yin// de bzhin 'dod pa thams cad 'di la 'grub lag tu//
370a1(pi): sman stong blta na sdug pa dug 'jil 'dra// pha rol phyin bcu spyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrib pa rnam gnyis spangs la phyag 'tshal lo// ston pas
370a2(pi): lung bstan thob la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa grangs med 'das pa'i sngon rol tu// mtha' yas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang //
370a3(pi): thugs rje'i dbang gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// rje mgon po dpal btsan sbyin la goms pas nam mkha'i mdzod la rol/
370a4(pi): tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas gnas gtsang mda' 'phang mtho// bzod pa phun sum tshogs pas mdangs gsal bkrag ra gsal// brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pas stobs
370a5(pi): bcu rtsal dang ldan// bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pas mdangs gsal rdo rje gnan mi 'gul// shes rab phun sum tshogs pas rigs lnga'i spyan dang ldan// 'jig rten
370a6(pi): thabs kyi 'dul bas phyag rgya tsan dan bzang // dge chos stobs su gyur pas spyi gtsug rdungs la 'phags// smon lam dbang du gyur pas 'jig rten kun la mnga'// ye shes
370a7(pi): lhun gyis grub pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed// pha rol phyin bcu spyod pas sa bcu'i gtso bo mdzad// sa bcu gtso bo lags pas chos kyi cod pan mdzes// mgon po spyan
370b1(pi): ras gzigs te thugs rje'i mnga' bdag can// nag po lha mchog khyod la bstod de gus phyag 'tshal// khyod la bstod pas bdag gi bsod nams dge tshogs 'phel ba dang //
370b2(pi): bdag gi bsam pa grub par thugs rjes mdzad du gsol// ma 'ongs pa na lung bstan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thal dbang po// zhes bya bar ni 'gyur ba'i tshe// 'dren pa'i
370b3(pi): zhabs rdung skyes nas kyang // chos kyi bdud rtsi 'thung bar shog/ 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ bar snang gi lha rnams kyis bstod pa'o// nag po chen po'i
370b4(pi): rgyud dpal yon tan 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma'i bdag po'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po las dum bu gsum pa'o// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//
370b5(pi): rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la ka pA la mahA tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po thod pa chen po'i rgyud/ dkon mchog gsum
370b6(pi): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo byang shar gyi mtshams na yongs 'du shing gi gnas mchog/ gnam lcags rngur mo gru gsum srug nas
370b7(pi): 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang rgya khyon dpag tu med pa/ thod pa brtsegs pa'i 'khor lo la keng rus kyi grong khyer gyi ra bas bskor ba/ zhing chen gyi ka ba dang mchog phran gyi dral ma can
371a1(pi): sprin med pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba dkar rgyas pa dang / gza' dang skar ma rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa// bse'i logs la mchod gi zur btsud pa/ rmang
371a2(pi): gnam lcags 'bar bas byas pa/ kha bang g.yus brgyan pa/ zhing chen po kha gdengs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs dang mtshams brgyan pa/ mtha' ma lcags ri nag pos bskor ba//
371a3(pi): phyogs dang mtshams thams cad zag dang khrag gi rgya mtsho rba klong 'khrug pa/ ro dang ro chen dang / ro'i rtsigs pa dang / ro'i 'phreng ba dang / ro'i rus pa dang / ro chad pa dang
371a4(pi): ro 'chad pa dang / ro zhe sdang gi mes tshig pa dang / phyed tshig pa dang / keng rus kyi phung po dang / keng rus kyi phyed pa dang / rus pa brul ba dang / ro bam pa dang / rnam par
371a5(pi): baM pa dang / rengs pa dang / 'khums pa dang / langs pa dang / 'gyel ba dang / klad pa lug pa dang / rnam par dmar ba la sogs pas/ gzhal yas khang bskor te
371a6(pi): gnas pa'i 'dam rdzab kyi nang na 'bu dang / srin dang / dus khrod kyi keng rus dang / stag dang / khyi dang / spyang khyi dang / lce spyang nag mo dang / kang ka dang / gyi ling dang / lin du dang /
371a7(pi): 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / dom dang / dred dang / dur bya la sogs pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis sha la za ba dang / 'cha' ba dang / 'thung ba dang / lhag po dang
371b1(pi): mchong pa dang / bskor ba dang / lta ba dang / rgod pa dang / cho nges 'debs pa dang / ku cho 'don pa la sogs pas bskor cing yang ba dang / dur khrod chen po'i gnas mnam pa/
371b2(pi): dang dri nga bas dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du khyab pa'i dbus na/ thod pa dgu brtsegs pa'i gzhal yas khang / mi ro dang rta ro la sogs pa gcal du dkram pa'i nang du/ bdud kyi yum
371b3(pi): gshin rje'i sring mo/ dpal lha mo nag mo tshon nu mthing nag 'bar ba la/ lcags kyi rdzi'u rta rkang gsum la phyin phyogs su zhon pa/ re lde dang gleng chen gyi ko bas dkris pa/ zhabs
371b4(pi): gnyis lcags sgrog tu bcug ste/ lte ba nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba dang / spyi bo'i gtsug nas mar gyi tshes brgyad 'char ba/ mche ba zur gsum rnam par gtsigs pa/ spyan
371b5(pi): dmar po sdang mig lhag pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ ral pa kham nag srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar ba/ g.yas pa gnam lcags kyi ral gri 'phyar ba/ lag pa g.yon pa na ne'u le rin po che'i
371b6(pi): 'phreng bas brgyan pa bsnams pa/ dur khrod kyi chas thams cad kyis brgyan cing / rlung dud kha dmar nag gi nang na zhe sdang gi 'du byed 'khrug pa/ me dpung dmar nag gi 'od las
371b7(pi): 'dod chags kyi tsha tsha 'phro ba/ de'i dbus na rab tu 'jigs par gnas pa'i 'phags ma lha mo nag mo chen mo/ 'khor srin po dang / srin mo dang / sha ba dang / grul bum dang /
372a1(pi): 'byung po dang / 'byung mo dang / dri za mo dang / klu mo dang / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / ma mo mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dpag tu med pas bskor
372a2(pi): cing gnas te 'dug go/ gzhan yang lha ma srin sde brgyad 'khor mang po dang / rnam thos kyi sras dang / 'phags skyes dang / mig mi bzang dang / yul 'khor srung la sogs pa thams cad
372a3(pi): 'dus te gnas par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe dpal mkha' 'gro ma nyid drang srong gnam gyi bu la gzigs par gyur to// dpal thod pa nag po chen pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u
372a4(pi): ste dang po'o// // de nas dpal mkha' 'gro ma nyid kyis sku gsung thugs kyi gsang sngags/ las rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gsang sngags
372a5(pi): drag po 'di gsungs so// oM ru ru tsa ti a shug me/ ba ti ru ba kha sha la rag mo hU~M/ ku ma ra da hUM nan/ tsa shi ku mA ra/ a bud ta khug shi mug shi re ma ti khug nyi ki la kI tsa/
372a6(pi): tud ta ke shu mud nya dgra la chug swA hA/ oM she ke mud nyid dgra bo kha la yan/ ta hUM tsakra/ dgra bo kha ma ya na/ ru ru a shug me/ ka ling ka/ ru ru a shug me/ s+ye ta tut+ta dgra bo
372a7(pi): ma ra ya swA hA/ oM ma snying sha rag mo ma hring thu rbad/ ma ma snying rtsa srog la chu thu sharbad// ma myos gug tsha ra ling sha snying rba da khru ri li li lang to rbad/ snying to rbad mA ra ya phaT swAhA/ de nas dpal ldan
372b1(pi): mkha' 'gro mas// gsang sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni// ri rab 'gul zhing rgya mtsho 'khrug/ sa gzhi rnam pa drug tu g.yos// drag po'i gnam lcags char du
372b2(pi): bag/ nad kyi 'du 'phro skar ltar 'khrug/ mtshon gyi bskal pa me ltar 'bar// 'jigs pa'i dgra yi gnam sa khengs// thams cad phung ba'i cho 'phrul gyis// rang gi
372b3(pi): 'khor rnam mkha' 'gro mas// srog nas drangs bzhin ma mo 'dus// gcig la gcig kyang rgod pa'i stabs// thams cad yang dag gsod la brtson// de tshe 'jig rten
372b4(pi): thams cad bsregs// rnam par bred nas 'dar bar gyur// mig rtsa rig rig lta byed cing // bstod pa sna tshogs byed pa yin// 'jig rten dregs pa'i lha srin yang
372b5(pi): thams cad gus bcas bstod pa spobs// sha khrag srog dbugs len pa'o// ma mo mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin ma// srin po gshin rje yi dgas sogs// pho mo zhabs drung 'dus
372b6(pi): nas kyang // khrag tu skyug cing bka' nyan byed// dpal thod pa nag po'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags drag po cho 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
372b7(pi): / de nas yang de'i tshe de'i dus na dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis// las rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa/ dam pa rnams
373a1(pi): kyis bgrod pa'i khyad par ni/ tshogs kyis sbyangs nas don dam mthong ba'i sa// bsnyen po ye shes rim par bsgom pa las// mthar phyin sa la
373a2(pi): phyin pa'i don mchog lags// de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di ltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te// dang po tshogs la yang dag par bsags pas// dang po'i
373a3(pi): sar skyor sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin brnyes// rab tu dga' ba'i sa la don dam ni// rnam par mi rtog skye med tshul gyis gzigs// dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par
373a4(pi): te// rang sems sa gnyis dag la rab bsten nas// de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha rol son// rang sems bzhi bzhi'i sa la cher bsgoms pas// lnga pa'i sa la bsam
373a5(pi): gtan pha rol son// rang chug pa yi sa la cher sbyangs pas// bdun pa la ni thabs kyis pha rol son// rang sems brgyad pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pas// dpal ldan lha
373a6(pi): mo nag mo'i smon lam nyid// dgu pa la yang stobs kyi yon tan bsgrubs// de yi stobs kyis ye shes 'phel bar bsgom// 'di ltar rnam par rdzogs par byas nas ni//
373a7(pi): sangs rgyas sa la smin pa'i smon lam can// sa brgyad non pa gzhon nu'i tshul 'chang ma// 'gro ba 'dul phyir drag po'i tshul ston cing // gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod
373b1(pi): la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'grub shog/ dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i chud las/ dpal nag po chen mo la/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal
373b2(pi): bo rnam thos sras kyis lam rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pas/ dpal gyi lha mo dkar
373b3(pi): mor gyur pa dang / dpal gyi lha mo ser mor gyur pa dang / dpal gyi lha mo dmar mor gyur pa dang / dpal gyi lha mo nag mo gyur pa de nyid la de ltar bstod pa/ sems nyid
373b4(pi): zhi bar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med// don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems//
373b5(pi): 'thun par bstan pa zhi ba dpal lha mo// zhi mdzad zhi 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can// zhi ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog dkar mo shin tu dag
373b6(pi): dus gsum kun tu thams cad zhi mdzad ma// bdag gi rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'di yi mthus// sngon 'das zhi bar grub pa khyod la ni// bdag gi smon lam 'phrin las bcol
373b7(pi): ba yang // bdag la phyi yi dgra bgegs nad rnams ni// phyi yi tshul gyis bar chad zhi bar mdzod// de bzhin nang gi nad dang dgra bgegs rnams// nang gi tshul gyis
374a1(pi): nyon mongs rnam rtog rnams// thams cad zhi ba gyur pa'i 'phrin las mdzod// sems nyid rgyas par gyur pa'i khyad par ni// sems nyid gud
374a2(pi): na med cing sems kyang med// don dam spos bral kha dog gzugs kyang med// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems// 'thun par bstan pa rgyas la dpal lha mo// rgyas
374a3(pi): mdzad rgyas gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshul can// rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo rab tu brjid// dus gsum kun tu thams ca
374a4(pi): rgyas mdzad ma// bdag gi rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'di yi mthus// sngon 'das rgyal ba grub pa khyod la ni// bdag gi smon lam 'phrin las bcol ba yang // bdag la
374a5(pi): phyi yi dgra bgegs nad rnams ni// phyi yi tshul gyis bdag don rgyas par mdzod// de bzhin nang gi nad dang dgra bgegs rnams// nang gi tshul gyis bsod nams ye shes
374a6(pi): rnams// thams cad rgyas gyur cig pa'i 'phrin las mdzod// rang sems dbang du gyur pa'i khyad par ni// sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med// don dam spos bral
374a7(pi): kha dog gzugs kyang med// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems// 'thun par bstan pas dbang mdzad dpal lha mo// dbang mdzad dbang 'gyur dbang gi ngang tshul can//
374b1(pi): dbang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog dmar mo shin tu mdzes// dus gsum kun tu thams cad dbang mdzad ma// bdag gi rnal 'byor ting 'dzin
374b2(pi): 'di yi mthus// sngon 'das dbang mchog grub pa khyod la ni// bdag gi smon lam 'phrin las bcol ba ni// bdag la phyi yi dgra bgegs nad rnams ni// phyi yi tshul gyis
374b3(pi): bdag don dbang du mdzod// de bzhin nang gi nad dang dgra bgegs rnams// nang gi tshul gyis nyon mongs rnam rtog rnams// nang gi tshul gyis thams cad dbang du mdzod// rang
374b4(pi): sems drag por gyur pa'i khyad par ni// sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med// don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med// kun rdzo pa rgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems//
374b5(pi): 'thun par bstan pa dbang mdzad drag po dpal lha mo// dbang mdzad drag mdzad drag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can// drag po'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags
374b6(pi): kyi sku mdog nag mo shin tu 'jigs// dus gsum kun tu thams cad zhi mdzad ma// bdag gi rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'di yi mthus// sngon 'das drag po grub pa khyod la
374b7(pi): ni// bdag gi smon lam 'phrin las bcol ba dang // bdag la phyi yi dgra bgegs nang rnams ni// phyi yi tshul gyis gnod pa drag po song // de bzhin rang gi nad dang dgra
375a1(pi): bgegs rnams// nang gi tshul gyis thams cad 'chi bar mdzod// khyod kyi rang bzhin ci yang ma yin pas// 'di ltar mtshan nyid ci yang snang ba ni//
375a2(pi): 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i 'gro don mdzad pa lags// bdag kyang las bzhi'i rang bzhin lhun grub nas// khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtson par shog/ dpal gyi lha mo gyur pa dri za'i
375a3(pi): 'khor gyis bskor ba la// dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pas 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i sgo nas bstod pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// // de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal
375a4(pi): po rdo rje gser mig can gyis rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams dang lhan cig tu/ dpal lha mo nag mo la nam mkha' lding gi 'khor gyis bskor nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo la drag
375a5(pi): po 'jogs par gyums gnas pa la bstod pa/ dpa la ldan nag mo dpag par dka' ba'i don// rabs kyi tshe 'phrul nam ma kha'i mtha' sa spyad// byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa
375a6(pi): nyid la// sgo gsum rdul snyed dbyangs kyis phyag 'tshal bstod// khyod ni bdag gi mchod pas ma bsgribs kyang // dpal ldan dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir// 'dod pa'i yon
375a7(pi): tan mkha' la char 'babs pas// mchod pa'i tshogs 'dis dbang po rgyas gyur cig/ dpal ldan khyod ni dge sdig dbang po ste// bdag gi lus ngag sems kyi sgrib pa'i tshogs//
375b1(pi): khyod kyi thad du 'gyod pas rab bshags nas// thugs rje'i shugs kyis sgrib pa byang bar mdzod// khyod kyis khyad par yongs su 'phags pa ni// 'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag
375b2(pi): don phun sum tshogs// dga' 'thun phrag dog med pas spro ba ni// rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyu la 'bul// 'di ltar yon tan ldan pa'i klu mchog ni// nag mo 'jigs pa'i
375b3(pi): mthu stobs kyis// phyogs bcu dus gsum kun tu 'gro don la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskul bar spobs// yang dag yon tan khyod kyi sku mchog ni// gdug pa
375b4(pi): 'dul zhing bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// sems can zad par ma gyur bar du ni// mya ngan mi 'da'o bzhugs par gsol ba gdab// 'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshags
375b5(pi): pa dang // rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi// dge ba 'di yis ngan song stod gyur nas// thams cad tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo// dpal lha mo nag mo chen
375b6(pi): mo la/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas yan lag bdun pa'i mchod brjod bstod pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bos//
375b7(pi): dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la klu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i sku la/ yon tan rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ gsang sngags rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid mo// yon tan rtags
376a1(pi): kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni// don du snang ba med kyang 'dul ba'i phyir// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar bstod pa'o// hUM/ sngon tshe dpal chen thugs kyi lha
376a2(pi): mo ni// nyi ma byang shar mtshams shed na// g.yu mtsho bse mkhar nang na bzhugs pa ni// 'phrin las rnam bzhi ma lus mdzad pa'i rtags// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig
376a3(pi): phyag gnyis bzhugs pa ni// chos nyid skye med thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i rtags// gdug pa 'dul phyir je'u nag rkang gsum zhon// khams gsum 'dul phyir thun po bung
376a4(pi): bu gnon// mya ngan mi 'da' rtags su lcags sgro mnga'// bdag don phun tshogs glang chen ko bas brgyan// gzhan don phun sum tshogs phyir re ldes dkris// byang chub sems
376a5(pi): ldan spyi gtsug zla bas brgyan// shes rab rtags phyir nyi mas lte ba brgyan// dug gsum sdong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang // bsod nams gter 'a byin phyag mtshan ne'u le
376a6(pi): bsnams// dbang drag rdzogs phyir ral pa khams nag spug/ nyon mongs 'dren phyir rno dpal mche ba gtsigs// 'khor ba ljags la gtar phyir rkan sgra ba rdebs// gdug pa
376a7(pi): zhe la gnan phyir sdang mig bgrad// thams cad dbang sdud chags phyir spyan rtsa dmar// gnyen po'i tshogs bcom mi 'gyur sku mdog nag/ ma mo 'dul phyir dur khrod rgyan
376b1(pi): gyis brgyan// sku gsung thugs ldan rtags kyi kha T+wAM gsor// sku gsum rdzogs byed thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan// drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir tshubs mas brgyan/
376b2(pi): nyon mongs bsregs phyir me dpung nang na bzhugs// 'dod khams bskyang phyir yongs 'du'i shing la brten// lha min 'dul phyir rdzong gi bka' bzlog ma// dpa' brtul brten
376b3(pi): phyir stag gi sham thabs bsnams// bstan pa bsrung phyir drag po'i cha lugs rdzogs// nga rgyal dbang sdud bdag med sgra sgrogs rtags// thabs kyi snyan cha g.yas pa seng
376b4(pi): ges brgyan// zhe sdang dbang sdud dug chen 'dul ba'i phyir// shes rab snyan cha gdug pa sbrul gyis brgyan// 'du byed mi rtag rtags kyi dril bu sgrog/ chags phyir rngam mdzad khrag
376b5(pi): gi rba glong 'thung // dam tshig bsrung phyir zhing lpags brgyan du mdzad// tha dad las rnams 'dul phyir rma byas brgyan// nyon mongs sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rab sbyangs nas//
376b6(pi): ye shes rig pa'i tshogs rnams shar mdzad phyir// rang bzhin gnas mchog byang shar mtshams na bstan// dbu ma'i sa la gnas rten ze'u chi bas// nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir
376b7(pi): srin mo'i tshul// byang chub sem dpa' khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bos rtags
377a1(pi): kyi sgo nas bstod pa ste le'u drug pa'o// // de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pas/ dpal lha mo chen mo la grul bum gyi
377a2(pi): 'khor gyis bskor ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya la bstod pa/ don dam gnyis med byang chub sems kyang med// srid pa gdul phyir rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// rang sems rnam dag drag
377a3(pi): po'i gzhal yas khang // rak+ta khrag gi rba glong 'khyil ba la// keng rus zod 'phreng zhing gi rgyan gyis brgyan// sku mdog gnag la rab brjid khro mo'i rgyal// sngon mo ral pa
377a4(pi): 'dzings pa'i sprul pa 'gyed// sku yi sprul pa dpal ldan re mdzu// gru gsum ser nag zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhengs// yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo kha la bzhad// 'phrin las
377a5(pi): rgyas pa thams cad nye bar mdzod// gsung gi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma ti// gru gsum dmar nag zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhengs// dmar mo chen mo dbang chen gtum mo ste//
377a6(pi): dbang gi 'phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod// thugs kyi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma dzAdz+ra// gru gsum sngo skya zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhengs// dkar mo chen mo zhi ba'i pho nya ste/
377a7(pi): zhi ba'i 'phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod// sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtsho la// dregs pa 'joms mdzad bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// sku gsung thugs kyi
377b1(pi): dngos grub stsal nas kyang // 'gro drug sgrol mdzad sems can kun gyi ma// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa rgyas mdzad ma// bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlobs/
377b2(pi): dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pas/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'i sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya la bstod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
377b3(pi): de nas lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris chen pos/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la lha ma yin gyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i sku la// don dam pa'i
377b4(pi): sgo nas shin tu yang dag pas bstod pa/ spos bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang // thugs kyi thugs mchog rnam dag bden pa'i yul// gdod nas gnyis med nam mkha'i
377b5(pi): snying po ni// dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin khyad par lags// de yi rnam dag brjod med ngo bo la// byis pa rnams ni bstod pa byed pa ltung // blun po rnams kyi dngos por rab brtags
377b6(pi): nas// gzugs can tshul du gang zhig bstod pa'i tshig/ rgyal ba'i dgongs pa thugs chung khyod nyid la// tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams// nam kyang sgrol bar gyur
377b7(pi): pa'i chos nyid min// gdod nas gnyis med bde chen ma rtogs par// khyod kyi smon lam rtags kyi cho 'phrul la// don du gzung zhing gang zhig bstod pa rnams// khyod la brten nas
378a1(pi): thams cad ltung bar 'gyur// gang zhig skye ba med pa shes pa dang // gdod nas gnyis med snying po bsgom nus na// gang zag de yis khyod ni bstod pa yin//
378a2(pi): khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yin// bskal pa grangs med 'das pas rab ltas kyang // khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog mthong mi nus// gang zhig gzugs su mi 'dzin rnams kyis
378a3(pi): mthong // sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa thams cad kyis// khyod nyid bos kyang bskal par mi thos te// 'di dag spangs pa'i rnal 'byor de yis ni// khyod kyang mthong la de yang khyod
378a4(pi): kyis thos// gang zhig thos 'dod ngal bas khyod bsgrubs na// blun po de yis nams kyang khyod nyid spangs// lus ngag spangs pa'i sems kyis khyod mchod na// mchod nas dngos grub
378a5(pi): de yis thob par 'gyur// khyod ni rgyal ba mang po'i yon tan sdud// chos kyi dbyings la rgyal ba rnams dang mo la// zab mo dbu ma'i rang bzhin ston pa khyod// mi mjed 'jig rten shin
378a6(pi): tu rgyud rtsub pa// phyi rol tshul gyi thabs kyis 'dren mdzad mo// khyod kyi sku ni 'di ltar rab brtags pa// sdig pa mang po stong nyid dang du bshags// stong nyid dam pa stong pa
378a7(pi): yang dag khyod// stong pa gnyis med shes pa rnams kyis bstod// 'di ltar bstod na bstod par 'gyur grang bas// khyod nyid bstod bya'i yul can ma yin nga // byis pa drang phyir don la
378b1(pi): 'di ltar bstod// dpal thod pa nag po'i rgyud las/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mor gyur pa la/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris kyis bstod pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// /
378b2(pi): / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo lha'i 'khor gyis bskor ba la/ dang po de'i dam pa chos dge ba bcu'i rnam par smin pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/ 'jig rten
378b3(pi): 'khor ba 'di ni las la grub// las ni rnam gnyis dge sdig gnyis kyi mthus// mtho ris ngan song srid pa'i grong khyer smin// sngon 'das bskal pa dang po'i pha rol nas//
378b4(pi): dge bcu'i las la rang sems cher sbyangs nas// lam gyi khyad par gong ma rab rdzogs kyang // mtho ris skyes pa rnams la dge ba bcu'i// tshul gyis ston mdzad phyi rdol bsgyur ba
378b5(pi): yi// dpal ldan lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'das pa'i dus na srog bcod rab spangs pas// sku tshe ring zhing gzugs byed phun sum tshogs// gzhan gyi lan tshogs
378b6(pi): gnod pa'i rkyen dang bral// 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma byin len pa'i tshul la rab myangs pas// bsod nams tshogs kyi longs spyod phun sum
378b7(pi): tshogs// bsod nams longs spyod mi 'grib rab brtan brnyes// sbyin pa'i gter 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi tshangs spyod pa'i dka' thub rnams bsrungs pos// mnga'
379a1(pi): gyi grong khyer dman las khyad par 'phags// srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du spangs pa ste// dge sbyong chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nyon mongs
379a2(pi): brdzun tshig spangs pa'i rnam smin gyis// bka' btsan gsung gis 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso// gsung mchog rnam dag brnyes pa'i rang bzhin te// bden pa gsung ba khyod la phyag
379a3(pi): 'tshal bstod// phra ma'i skyon spangs mi phyed 'khor dang ldan// nyid la rnam par 'dud pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// lha dang lha min bden pas 'dul mdzad pa// dkar mo
379a4(pi): 'khor skyong khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ngag 'khyal spangs pa'i yon tan smin pa ni// ting 'dzin rtse gcig mi g.yo bar chad spangs// dgongs 'brel tshul du bstan pa skyong
379a5(pi): mdzad ma// byis pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nga rgyal tshig rtsub spangs pa'i yon tan ni// zhi ba'i tshig 'jam lha mo dbyangs can ma// tshig rtsub gshe ba'i
379a6(pi): gnyen po med pa ste// tshig rtsub 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rang sems brnab sems spangs pa'i khyad par ni// 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnam par spang ba'i rtags//
379a7(pi): bdag med rtags su seng ge rna bas brgyan// brnab sems spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal ba stod// gzung ba'i yul la gnod sems rnam spangs pas// phyi rol yul ni gnyis med
379b1(pi): / chos su gzigs// gang la gnod sems yang dag spangs pa'i rtags// sbrul gyi rna ba can la phyag 'tshal bstod// log par lta ba'i phyogs ni rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas chos las
379b2(pi): 'khrungs pa'i gzugs brnyan khyod// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can// spos bral don ldan ston la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jig rten 'di na las gnyis dag ma dag/ ma dag mi
379b3(pi): dge bcu las ngan song grub// dag pa'i dge ba bcu las mtho ris grub// las 'di dge ba dang por rab spyad pas// gang nas gong ma'i sa la rab gnas kyang // dge bcu'i rtags ni
379b4(pi): dman pa'i zhing 'dir bstan// gdug pa'i tshul gyis 'gro ba 'dren mdzad ma// bstod par 'os pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ dpal lha mo
379b5(pi): nag mo chen mo la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dang po dge bcu'i sgo nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas bstod pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
379b6(pi): ljon pas/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la mi 'am ci'i 'khor gyis bskor ba la gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/ dpal ldan lha mo gnyis su med pa ste// don dam spos thal chos
379b7(pi): nyid 'di las 'tshal// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med pas bden// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa gnyis med zab// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su med pas 'phags// las
380a1(pi): dang rnam smin gnyis su med pas bstod// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med yang dag smin// yul dang yul can gnyis med gcig gi ngang // spos dang spros med don
380a2(pi): dam dbyings kyis bsdus// bsod nams ye shes gnyis med tshogs chen to// mtho dang dma' ba gnyis med dag pas bstod// bdag dang bdag gi chos ni ngang tshul gcig/ gzung dang 'dzin/
380a3(pi): pa gnyis ni 'khor ba'i mtha'// mtho ris ngan song gnyis bral dag pa'i zhing // bzang ngan gnyis med rang bzhin gcig gis bstod// bskyed dang rdzogs pa gnyis med lhun
380a4(pi): grub mchog/ sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med sems nyid de// bsgrub dang bsgrub bya gnyis med grub pa'i ngang // bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchog gcig gis bstod//
380a5(pi): yab yum mkha' dbyings gnyis med byang chub sems// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med 'brel ba'i don// stong dang mi stong gnyis med zhi ba'i ngang // 'gyur dang 'gyur med rtsol
380a6(pi): bral phyag 'tshal bstod// sgra tshig gnyis med brjod pa med pa'i ngang // lus ngag gnyis med sems nyid gcig gi tshul// rtsol byed rtsol bya gnyis med don gcig pas//
380a7(pi): rnam par spros med don dam dbyings kyis bstod// mu stegs sangs rgyas gnyis med tshul gcig pas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med don rtogs te// srid dang rnam grol yang
380b1(pi): dag don gcig pas// thams cad gnyis med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyi dang nang gnyis gnyis med gcig gi dang // sems ldan sems med rnam dag zhi ba'i tshul//
380b2(pi): snang dang mi snang gnyis med gcig gis mthong // gnyis med don mchog mthong la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di dag rnams ni don dam zab mo'i tshul// spros pa med pa'i
380b3(pi): don dang 'brel ba de// khyod kyi rgyud la 'di dag yongs su tshang // 'di ltar bstod pas bdag kyang khyod ltar shog/ gnyis su med pas thugs su chud pa'i mchog/
380b4(pi): gnyis med don la rtag tu gnas pa'i mchog/ gnyis su med pa de ni khyod nyid de// bdag kyang gnyis med don gyis 'dir 'grub shog/ dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud
380b5(pi): las dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gnyis med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa ste le'u bcu pa'o// // de nas dpal rdo rje
380b6(pi): mkha' 'gro ma nyid kyis// thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir drag po'i gsang thun gyi ngan sngags 'di gsungs so// trag ragra kha mun tra b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ra ya thun ya/ trag rag
380b7(pi): snying khrag snying b+h+yo/ ma ra ya thun ya/ sU ta sU ta b+h+yoHma ra ya thun ya/ sha sha trag sha trag/ mA ra ya thun ya/ trag mo tra ba/ snying trag snying trag/ mA ra ya thu na ya/
381a1(pi): trag mo trag ma/ ma ra ya thun ya/ 'di dag gsungs pa'i mod la ni// 'jig rten thams cad phung bar gyur// gnam lcags 'phreng ba lta bu yi//
381a2(pi): mda' ni 'jig rten char pa 'bab// lcags sol mal nas phyung 'dra ba'i// phur pa 'jig rten snying la zug/ gnam lcags tshwa tsha lta bu yi// yungs dkar mang po thad du thim
381a3(pi): las kyi dra ba 'joms pa'i phyir// kham bu'i thun ni snying la gnod// thams cad kha nas khrag skyug cing // kha thun shugs kyis myos pa dang // 'jig rten dug gi char pa
381a4(pi): babs// gsang thun gsang ba'i sngags zor yin// de tshe 'jig rten dngangs nas bsreg/ thams cad skyabs nas bstod pa byed// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las//
381a5(pi): drag po gsang thun gyi gsang sngags bstan pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas srin po'i rgyal po lang ka mgrin bcus/ rang gi 'khor srin po'i tshogs
381a6(pi): dang bcas pas/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la bstod pa/ dbyings phyag dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba thugs rjes bskyang phyir yum gyi tshul// mtshan ma'i skyon
381a7(pi): spangs sku mdog dmar mor ston// drag shul spyod phyir gcer bu srin mo'i tshul// lha chen gdug phyir sdang mig ral pa gsigs// skye shi rtsad gcod mi bzad mche ba gtsigs
381b1(pi): byang chub sems ldan spyi gtsug zla gsal rgyas// g.yul ngo bzlog phyir mdung dang ru mtshon bsnams// srid gsum bsgral phyir shes rab ral gri bsnams// dgra bgegs
381b2(pi): 'dul phyir nad kyi rgyal po bsnams// dbul ba sel phyir ne'u le'i rkyal pa thogs// 'chi bdag bzlog phyir snyan cha seng ges brgyan// gdug pa 'dul phyir klu dbang snyan char brgyan
381b3(pi): 'byung po dang ngas phyir thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan// rnal 'byor bskyang phyir dril chen sgra snyan sgrogs// klu chen 'dul phyir sbrul gyi ske rags bcings// bdud dpung snga
381b4(pi): bkong zhing lpags gos su gon// smon lam mi 'dor sku slad re ldes dkris// mdzes par bya phyir rkang sgrog lcags las byas// nyon mongs mtsho skems lte ba nyi mas brgyan//
381b5(pi): srin po 'dul phyir chibs su bong bu chi bas// stong gsum bgrod phyir tshub ma'i nang na bzhugs// dur khrod gnas phyir g.yog 'khor ma mo'i tshogs// 'khor ba 'jig tshe
381b6(pi): sdug bsngal sems can rnams// khyod kyi zhal du thams cad bzhugs par 'gyur// brtse ldan thugs rjes 'gro ba kun bskyang nas// byang chub spyod pa thar lam ston mdzad
381b7(pi): pa'i// lha mo mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la/ srin po'i rgyal po lang ka mgrin bcus bstod pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//
382a1(pi): de nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la 'khor thams cad yongs su bcas te/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i zad du song nas yongs su bstod pa/ nad kyi bdag mo
382a2(pi): dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo// 'gro ba kun gyi mnga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// til mar gyis bskus lan bu gcig pa la// ro nyes rna chas bgegs shing cha lugs ma lus 'chang //
382a3(pi): rgyan du rkang sgrog lcags las byas pa gcig gis// rang gi rkang pa mdzes par byas pa yi// gcer bu bong bu zhon zhing kun tu rgyu ba'i lha mo khyod// bdag nyid mdzes par shes shing gzhan
382a4(pi): lta khyod kyis mkhyen// khyod kyi spyod pa dod la su zhig shes// nag zhig 'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzag du ba 'thul ba na// lha mo khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun
382a5(pi): skad cig tsam gyis bzhugs par 'gyur// nag mo mi thod thogs pas khyod ni grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma ste dur khrod steng du dgyes// g.yon can rnam bzhi'i nad byed 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa sel
382a6(pi): zhing zhi la mi bzang dril yang sgrogs// khyod ni dpa' bo dag gis mgo bo mtshon gyis legs par bcad pa'i 'phreng ba thogs shing gar yang byed// lag pa gnyis kyang bskum gyis
382a7(pi): gtso che la// klu dbang 'jigs pa'i ske rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung dang rdal gri thogs pa la// khrag gi chang gis rab tu myos pa mig rtsa dmar por 'gyur zhing mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba de ni
382b1(pi): 'byung po phal chen rnams kyis mthong // ko rlon chan pas dras te rkyang ba'i gos kyis gnam gyi phyed g.yogs ma// phyed ni smyug ma'i re ldes rab tu dkris// mi yi rgyu ma lcags
382b2(pi): kyis bkang ba dag gis zhal gyi zla gam brgyan cing 'gram par sil// lus ni sbrum gyis byugs shing khrag dang thig les bris// mi ro'i ngasha la sos ni chem chem gcod byed cing // nag
382b3(pi): mo thod pa can ni bdag la skyong gyur cig/ drag mo mi sha kha ni thogs pa snga nas ma byung khyod mthong na// ma mo rnams kyang skrag cing dngangs 'thon nas// mig rtsa rig rig lha mo khyod
382b4(pi): la 'dud// nag mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la ni// brgya byin la sogs nyon cig bzhin du bstod phyag 'tshal// gshin rje rnams kyang 'dar zhing 'dud par
382b5(pi): byed// mi rnams dag ni 'gro ba ma lus pa yi 'jug btul nas// rna ba ya gcig la ni zang gis 'gro ba'i gdengs kar ldan// ya gcig la ni seng ge mtshungs byed brgyan cing rgya mtsho
382b6(pi): bskor ba'i sa gzhi gnon// steng gi phyogs nas rgyu ba'i nyi ma'i 'od zer stong gi 'od ldan khyod kyi lte ba'i phyogs su gzhag/ rgya mtsho'i klong na me 'bar chu rnams skems par byed
382b7(pi): pa'i bud med thams cad zhi mdzad ma// lha chen sku dang mtshams par bzhugs pa'i bka' zlog nag mo mi nad phyugs nad kun la 'jigs pa med// ma cig khyod nyid la ni bdag ni
383a1(pi): gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod cing bstod par bgyi// rgya mtsho gting nas me 'bar ma// mtsho rnams skems par nus pa ste// bud med thams cad zhi mdzad
383a2(pi): ma// lha chen sku yi phyed du bzhugs// rdzong dang dka' bzlog nag mo che// lha dang lha min phyag byas pas// mi nad phyugs nad gang yin khyod kyis mkhyen// de la 'jigs pa med pa 'gyur
383a3(pi): mi nad thams cad zhe mdzad ma// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo khyod// rtag par bdag la skyong gyur cig/ dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo
383a4(pi): 'dzam bu gling gi mi'i yul du bram ze mchog sred kyis bstod pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas rigs shes rnam par ldan pas/ bram ze ke'u 'di nas/
383a5(pi): dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la rnam par bstod pa/ lha mo mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gi btsun par khyod la bstod// 'jig rten 'di na rang dbang thob// sngon gyi bram
383a6(pi): zes bstod pa ltar// bkra shis mchog bsgrub sems bde ga nas// yid myur gzugs chen kun tu grags// ma mor byed cing 'jig rten skyong // dpa' brtan rtag spyod brtson/
383a7(pi): 'grus che// 'thab mo g.yul las rtag tu rgyal// snying rje che zhes mngon par bstod pa ltar// gos su dang gos sngon po gon// sdug dang mi sdug sna tshogs 'chang // sman mig
383b1(pi): mthong na kun kyang dngangs// dpag med mchog bsgrub sems bder gnas// dad cing phyogs pa'i mi rnams sdud// bar bar ri brag zab mor gnas// bar bar tshal dang shing la
383b2(pi): gnas// bar bar phug chu 'gram na gnas// bar bar rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas// bar bar ri rab rtse la gnas// lha mo'i gnas rten de ru bca'// gal te ri 'tshal mi rgod dag
383b3(pi): rtag tu lha mo khyod la mchod// rma bya'i sgros ni rgyal mtshan byas// rtag tu 'jig rten bsrung bar nus// seng ge stag spyang rtag tu rtog/ gnag lug bya rnams srung bar byed// rdo rje
383b4(pi): dril chen dkrol nas ni// byin d+hi ril sgra kun tu sgrogs// lan 'ga' lag tu tri shu la thogs// lag gnyis lag na zla ba'i ru mtshon thogs// mar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig la/
383b5(pi): de yi dus su mchod byas nas// lha mo mchod pas lhag pa med// 'dud tshul lha chen srin mor ston// 'thab mo g.yul mthong stag snying rje// skye bo mang po'i nang rtags can//
383b6(pi): lha mo mchod pas lhag pa med// re 'ga' rtse dga'i bu mor ston// lha dga' thab tshe rgyal bar byed// gtso bor byed cing kha lo sgyur// bud med nang na mchog tsam spyod//
383b7(pi): tshig dbang 'jig rten mgon por grags// rgyal po'i khyab nas pad+ma 'dra// zhal bzangs zla ba nya ba 'dra// chu bo dag la gru zam 'dra// dgra bo chom rkun 'jigs pa'i tshe//
384a1(pi): dran pas nyon mongs ni mdzad cing // de dag thams cad sel bar mdzad// de bas bdag gis btsun par bstod// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/
384a2(pi): lha mo mthu chen la bram ze ke'u di nas bstod pa ste le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas/ gsang sngags rnam pa gsum gyi khyad par
384a3(pi): gsungs pa/ dang por sngags kyi mgo la au// ru ru tsa ti a shug me// ba ti ru tra ba sha la// rag mo hUM rnams bcu bdun sngags// bod pa srog gi snying po yin// ku ma ra ste
384a4(pi): 'dod la zhon// d+ha dunan ni dbyings na gnas/ tsi sha kum ra gzhon drag/ ma tshud tu ga shi mug // ri ma to mo tham nyid yin// gsang sngags yi ge rtsa gsum ste/
384a5(pi): gnad la bor ba'i bod pa yin// tut+ta ke shug mud nyid nya ni// dgra la chug ces rbad pa dang // bod pa'i gsang sngags khyad par yin// de bzhin rbad pa'i mgo la au// she khe mud
384a6(pi): nyi zhes bos nas// dgra bo kha la yan zhes rbad// yi ge bcu pa rbad pa yi// srog gi snying por gyur pa yin// d+ha du dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// tsakra 'khor los gsad pa ni//
384a7(pi): dgra bo kha la yan zhes bsgrubs// sngags dgu dbyangs su gsad phyir rbad// de ltar nye bar bskul ba'i phyir// ru ru a shug me ma 'khor// ka li ki ne sgra gzugs la// ru ru a
384b1(pi): shug me zhes bskul// s+ye ka te tud ta zhes la// khyod kyi dgra bo gsad pa'i phyir// mA ra ya zhes gsad pa dang // sAhA sngags kyi sham bu tshang // yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga 'di// nye bar
384b2(pi): las la bskul ba yi// rbad pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs// thams cad 'dus pa'i 'phreng ba 'di// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi rbad sngags yin// 'dir yang gsad phyir mgo la oM//
384b3(pi): ma zhes nga la bos nas ni// dgra yi snying sha gcod pa ni// reg mo sprul pa'i snying po yin// ma sring snying pos gsad pa'i phyir// dbang po thum dang lus srog rbad// gsad
384b4(pi): sngags yi ge bcu pa 'di// gsad pa'i spyi khyab sngags kyi mgo/ ma ma snying rtsa srog la num// yi ge bdun pa'i nang gsad yin// phyi rol rbad pa thum sha rbad// yi ge gsum
384b5(pi): pa'i de nyid yin// phyi nang gsad phyir ma mo brlang // sngags kyi brda ni gug tshar ling // sgra ltar bshad pa sha snying rbad// yi ge brgyad pa 'di yis ni// bsgrub bya'i phyi
384b6(pi): nang gnyis ka gsod// dbang po rnams ni shin thum// brda tshig spa ltar byin gyis brlabs// dbang po kun la ri li li// lang rdo rbad ni gsad pa yin// yi ge bdun pa
384b7(pi): dbang po gsad// sgo lnga'i shes pas snying po zad// sgo lnga'i gsang sngags gsum pa yin// thams cad gsod phyir kun gyi sgra// ma ra ya zhes gsad pa yin//
385a1(pi): phaT kyis drag sngags thams cad rdzogs// de bzhin swA hA sngags kyi mtha'// yi ge drug pa'i mthu stobs ni// lus dang dbang po shes pa dang //
385a2(pi): thams cad gsad pa'i gsang sngags yin// yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa bzhis ni// chag po sngags kyi lus rnams rdzogs// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang
385a3(pi): sngags rnam pa gsum gyi khyad par bshad pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o// // de nas dpal rdo rje nag mo chen mos// 'khor bye bdud phyur dang bcas
385a4(pi): nas dud 'gro'i 'jig rten du rnam par song ngo // de nas 'jig rten gyi khams na dud 'gro'i rnam pa 'dab ma can gyi rigs dang // sder mo can dang mche ba can gyi rigs dang /
385a5(pi): rwarA dang gzhug ma yod pa'i rigs dang / drod las skyes pa dang gsher las skyes pa dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa la sogs pa
385a6(pi): rnams kyis rnam par bstod/ dud 'gro de dag kyang mthu dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i
385a7(pi): bsam pa dang ston pa'i zhal mthong ba'i khyad par yod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa yin te/ lam dang nye ba/ lam du 'jug pa/ las la gnas pa/ lam gyi 'phrul pa
385b1(pi): can 'ba' zhig ste/ de dag rnams kyis dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang shes nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas yongs su bstod pa// 'jig rten
385b2(pi): gtso la rtag tu gus phyag 'tshal// ma rnams nang na khyod ni mchog gyur te// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kun gyi mchog/ byad bzhin rab mdzes thams cad lta bar 'os
385b3(pi): mig yangs pad+ma sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra// bsod nams rin chen 'bar ba'i grags pas brgyan// dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bus mtshungs// ding bdag dam pa khyod la
385b4(pi): bsngags pas na// ji ltar seng ge gcan gzan mchog gyur pa// sngags sogs tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba yin// bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad grub par mdzod// de nas
385b5(pi): dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas 'khor rnams kyi gnyer gsungs pa/ 'jig rten 'di na bzang po'i dus// zla gcig drug ldan nga yi dus// yar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig dang //
385b6(pi): de bzhin mar gyi bcu gcig dgu// 'pho ba dang ni phyed dus drug/ nga ni 'jig rten nyul ba'i dus// lha min drang srong rnams kyis mchod// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin drod nyul zhing
385b7(pi): dge sdig las kyis bag chags lta// de yi dus su khyed rnams kyis// nga yi 'khor rnams bskyang ba dang // dam tshig ldan pa bsrung ba dang // lta ba can la gus pa dang // spyod/
386a1(pi): pa can rnams bsrung bar shis// dam nyams gsad par 'os pa ni// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang // slob dpon smod par byed pa dang // dam tshig
386a2(pi): mched las 'khus pa dang // sdig can yongs la gnod pa de// myur du gsod pa'i pho nyar byos// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis shin tu bstod cing thams cad bka' nyan par
386a3(pi): gyur nas/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo'i thad du 'dus nas/ rdo rje theg pa chen po'i srungs mar gyur te rgyud dag pa'i tshul gyis byin gyis brlabs so// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud
386a4(pi): las dud 'gro'i 'jig rten rnam par btul ba ste le'u bcu drug pa'o// / de nas rdo rje lha mo nag mo chen mos 'khor bye ba dung phyur dang bcas te/ yi dgas kyi
386a5(pi): 'jig rten du rnam par rgyu zhing rnam par song ngo // yi dgas kyi zhing dang / khams dang / mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste/ yi dgas nam mkha' la rgyu ba mthu bo che'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa
386a6(pi): gzugs mi 'dra ba kha dog tha dad pa dang / las dang bsod nams las grub pa'i nga rgyal can rnams dang / sa gzhi dngagling bar dang / mun pa dang / grib ma dang / tshal gyi nang na
386a7(pi): 'dug pa'i rig ser sna'i rnam par smin pa la shas cher gyur pa/ lus nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin can so so'i sdug bsngal mi 'dra ba ste tshan mang pos gdungs pa/ rang gi shes pa 'phrul pa'i drab
386b1(pi): rgya mdung dang / srid pa'i phur pa chen pos btab ste 'dug pa ltar ston pa/ de dag 'a dul ba'i gnyen po che 'dra ba'i sprul pa khyad par dang bcas par gyur to// de nas dpal lha mo chen
386b2(pi): mos yi dgas kyi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pa
386b3(pi): tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+hA ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nur k+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yad ts+tsha sarba karma su tsa me tsat+ta shri yang ku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga ba na sarba ta thA ga ta
386b4(pi): badz+ra m+me muny+tsa badz+ra b+hA ba ma hA sa ya satwa a/ de ltar yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad kyang sgrib pa sbyangs te dag par byas nas/ rdo rje theg pa chen po'i srungs ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi gral du
386b5(pi): bkod do// de nas yi dgas kyi tshogs kyis bstod pa/ sangs rgyas stong gi bstan pa'i gdung 'dzin pa// gsang sngags 'khor skyong 'gro ba 'dul mdzad cing // chos dang
386b6(pi): rdzas rnams mi 'jig ster mdzad ma// sbyin pa'i bdag mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dam pa rnams dang 'thun pa'i don mnga' ba// sems can don rnams 'thun par 'dren mdzad
386b7(pi): cing don dang 'thun pas don 'thun smon lam can// don 'thun cho 'phrul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thog ma bar dang tha ma dge sems kyis// gang gzugs ji ltar 'os
387a1(pi): pa'i rna ba la// 'thun pa'i tshig dang gsung gis 'dul mdzad ma// snyan par smra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/
387a2(pi): yi dgas kyi 'jig rten btul ba ste le'u bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas 'khor bye ba dung phyur dang bcas te// dmyal ba'i 'jig rten
387a3(pi): du rnam par song ngo // 'jig rten de ni 'di lta ste// mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa'i ngo bo sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho chen po mtha' la thug pa med pa la gnas pa dang / de lta bu'i sprul pa'i
387a4(pi): gzugs brnyan khyad par can rnams dang ldan par gyur to// de nas dpal ldan mkha' 'gro mas/ sdig pa'i tshogs sbyangs pa'i gsang sngags kyi don bshad pa// mi dge ba'i rnam smin
387a5(pi): sbyang ba'i phyir// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i yi ge ni// rgyal ba nga yis brtan par bya// oM ni rgyal ba rnams kyi sku// badz+ra sa twa khyod brjod pas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//
387a6(pi): dam tshig gis mnyes sa ma ya// ma nu pa las brjod pas// dam tshig stobs kyi zil gyis gnon// badz+ra sad tra khyab pa'i mtshan// tre no pa tiSh+Tha brjod pas// mnyes byed spyod pa
387a7(pi): / rlabs po che// dzaM D+ho me b+ha ba zhes brjod pas ni// de 'dra'i thabs chen bdag la nus// su bo Sh+yo me b+ha ba ni// rnam thar mchog gi bdag nyid yin// a nu rak+to me b+ha ga/ mi rtog
387b1(pi): gnas su bdag nyid 'gyur// su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba yang // gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid yin// sarba sid+d+hi me zhes pa// dngos grub thams cad bdag la 'dus// pra yad ts+tsha ni de tshad med/
387b2(pi): de yi byin brlabs bstan pa yin// sarba karma zhes brjod pas// las kyi 'bras bu rnam dag pa'i// rjes su bdag nyid dag pa yin// sa tsa me byin tshad med gsal// de ltar byang
387b3(pi): byang chub sems tsit+taM// shri yang ku ru hUM brjod pas// bdag gi lus las de ltar grub// ha ha ha ha gnyis med bzhad// ho ni gnyis med gnyis chen po// b+ha ga wan gyi mtshan
387b4(pi): nyid ni// bcom ldan 'ad sa dang tha dad min// sar+tha ta thA ga ta dang // badz+ra m+be mu ny+tsa ni// thams cad de bzhin gshegs rdo rje// badz+ra swa b+ha ba ma hA dang // sa ma ya dang srA hA
387b5(pi): a// rdo rje mdzad du gsol ba yin// de nas rab tu gsungs pa ni// sngon 'das dus na gsad sogs pas// de nyid dmyal ba 'dir skyes nas// khyod la gnod pa ma yin te//
387b6(pi): de yi rnam par smin pa ni// shes pa 'khrul pas yul 'di mthong // gnod pa'i dmyal dpon rje bo ni// de nyid sems can yin gyur na// de yi sdig pa gang du 'gro// gang du
387b7(pi): de yi rnam smin ni// rgyal bas gang du ma gsungs so// gnod byed sems can yin na go/ thug pa med par cis mi 'gyur// rang sems nges par 'khrul yin pas// chos nyid
388a1(pi): rab tu shes pas byos// khyed rnams ma 'ongs chos chen la// rab tu spyod par gyur pa ni// khyim gyi tha stag de la ni// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che//
388a2(pi): pad+ma rgya gram gtso bo dang // b+ha ga kha T+wAM ral gri dang // dbu rgyan cod pan lha yi rigs// rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'dzin par 'gyur// nga yi 'khor rnams bskyang ba dang // rigs kyang
388a3(pi): 'dzin par shin tu byos// de nas dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis bstod pa/ byams pa'i rang bzhin phan pa'i sems// gzhan gyi rgyud rnams cher skyob snying rje can// /
388a4(pi): gzhan gyi don thob dga' ba'i dga' ba can// zug rngu kun dang bral ba'i btang snyoms la// phyag 'tshal bstod de rab tu gus phyag 'tshal// de ltar dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams
388a5(pi): cad dga' bar byas te/ rdo rje theg pa chen po'i srung ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi gral du bkod do// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ dmyal ba'i 'jig rten btul ba ste
388a6(pi): le'u bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas dpal rdo rje lha mo nag mo chen mos 'khor bye ba dung phyur dang bcas te/ lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten du song ngo // de'i tshe lha
388a7(pi): ma yin gyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas/ lha ma yin gyi nga rgyal nyon mongs pa rnams las cher grub rnams kyis// mgrin gcig tu dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la 'di skad ces gso/
388b1(pi): to// dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa' khyod kyis ni// bdag cag btul nas thar pa'i lam la bkod// sku gsung thugs kyi gzi brjid ma bzod pas// bka' nyan chos skyong
388b2(pi): theg chen zhing la mchis// srid pa 'di nas zhing khams mthar phyin du// bdag cag bskyang phyir bskul zhing gsol ba ni// khyod kyi thad du smon lam btab pa ni// tshe rabs kun tu
388b3(pi): dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzod// yid bzhin nor bu bum pa dpag bsam sogs// sems ldan med kyang gzhan gyi don 'byung na// snying rje brlan pa'i dpal ldan byang chub sems//
388b4(pi): khyad par ci zhig smos te phyag 'tshal bstod// sa chu me/ rlung 'byung ba'i stobs kyis kyang // 'jig rten 'degs byed sems med 'di 'dra na// smon lam dbang gis 'gro ba'i rten
388b5(pi): 'gyur ba// khyod kyi rnam thar khyad par med kyang bstod// bdud dang srin po gshin rje gnod sbyin sogs// snying rje chung yang mos pas brten nas phan// dpal ldan snying rje'i nga
388b6(pi): rgyal can khyod la// mos pas skyobs kyang cher skyob mdzad phyir bstod// 'jig rten 'di na srid pa'i 'khor lo rnams// byed pa med kyang las kyi dbang btsan pas// sngags dang
388b7(pi): phyag rgya ting 'dzin smon brlan na// 'khor ba'i pha rol son par mdzad phyir bstod// ltas ngan bdud dang mu stegs la brten nas// 'jig rten 'di yi dregs pa thang gcig bskyed/
389a1(pi): bdag cag dam pa khyod la skyabs gsol bas// bdag don phun sum tshogs pa sgrub phyir bstod// 'jig rten dngos po stobs kyi khyad pa ni// rten cing
389a2(pi): 'brel ba'i nus pa dpag med nas// shes rab snying rje'i bdag nyid can khyod la// rten na mchog tu grub phyir phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas lha ma yin thams cad yang dag pa'i lam la
389a3(pi): bzhag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bkod nas// rdo rje theg pa chen po'i srung ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi bal du bkod do// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ lha ma yin
389a4(pi): gyi 'jig rten btul ba ste le'u bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma chen mo la 'khor bye ba dung phyur dang bcas te/ slar dang po'i gnas byang shar
389a5(pi): mtshams ri rab kyi steng yongs su shing gi gnas mchog tu song ngo // der 'khor dpag tu med pa mthu dang ldan pa'i zag po lha ma srin sde brgyad la sogs pas bskor te 'dug pa dang /
389a6(pi): lha'i dbang po la sogs pas dpal gyi lha mo la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa dang / de nas dpal gyi lha mos 'khor rnams la gsungs pa/ mchod pa rnam lnga zhes bya ba/ sngon 'das pa'i
389a7(pi): bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i sngon rol nas/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / 'phagasapa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nga la bshid pa/ ngas khyod la bshad gyis nyon cig/
389b1(pi): mchod pa rnam pa lnga 'di lta ste/ sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzas dang / tshig bshad lnga'o// de ni lam lnga la sbyar ba ste/ de rnams lus ngag yid gsum gyis bsag
389b2(pi): pa ni/ sbyor ba dang theg pa chen po'i tshogs kyi lam du'agyur ro// de rnams la lus ngag yid gsum gyis sbyor ba ni/ theg pa chen po'i sbyor lam du shes par bya/ de rnams kyi lus
389b3(pi): ngag yid gsum gyi rig pa ni/ theg pa chen po'i tshogs kyi lam du 'gyur ro// de la rdzas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pas/ sa dang po bsgom pa dang / sngags ni tshul khrims
389b4(pi): yin pas/ sa gnyis pa sgom pa dang / phyag rgya bzod pa yin pas/ sa gsum pa bsgom pa dang / tshig bshad ni btson 'grus yin pas/ sa bzhi pa bsgom pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ni
389b5(pi): bsam gtan yin pas/ sa lnga pa bsgom pa dang / de rnams so sor ma 'dres pa ni shes rab yin pas/ sa drug pa bsgom pa dang / de thams cad ni byang chub pa'i thabs su gyur pas//
389b6(pi): sa bdun pa bsgom pa dang / de rnams lus ngag yid gsum gyi smon pa byang chub sems su gyur pas/ sa brgyad pa bsgom pa dang / de las dad pa la sogs pa'i stobs skyes pas/ sa dgu
389b7(pi): pa bsgom pa dang / de rnams sbyar gzhag pa'i 'bras bu ye shes su gyur pas/ sa bcu pa sgom pa ni/ theg pa chen po'i bsgom lam du 'gyur ro// de'i mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu ni/
390a1(pi): sangs rgyas kyi sa la gzugs rnam par snang mdzad/ rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa'/ tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan/ 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas/
390a2(pi): 'du byed don yod grub pa ni mthar phyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyang 'di las gyur pa ste/ khyod kyis kyang yang dag par sbyor cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bstan pa la gnod pa rnams la//
390a3(pi): thod pa nag po'i nang drag pos bkang ste dkyil 'khor du bkod de/ byang ri gnyen po'i kha nas 'phang bar bya'o// de nas lha rnams kyis bstod pa/ chos dbyings rnam dag thugs su
390a4(pi): chud pa'i yum// mngon spyod rgyal ba mang pos byin brlabs pas// dus 'dir 'gro drug gyen du 'dren pa'i dpal/ la lar drag po rnams kyi chung mar ston// gdug pa'i ma dang
390a5(pi): 'jigs pa'i sring mo dang // la lar tshogs kyi rje mo 'thun pa'i gzugs// yon tan cha las ci yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs// zug rngu zab mo ston la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal thod
390a6(pi): pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ lha'i 'jig rten btul ba ste le'u nyi shu pa'o// // dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so// /
390a7(pi): rgya gar skad du/ a mo g+ha sid+d+hi tiSh+Tha a ba lo tan+ta na ma/ bor skad du/ don yod pa dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ yab mngon rdzogs rgyal
390b1(pi): po la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon 'das pa'i dus ma 'ongs pa'i sngon rol na/ srid pa thams cad yum gyi b+ha gar shar bar mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i
390b2(pi): dpal he ru kas/ chos thams cad thig le chen po'i tshul du ye nas sangs rgyas shing / rang rig pa'i ye shes chen po rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul du mnyam zhing dbyer mi phyed de/
390b3(pi): thams cad so so ma yin rang bzhin med pa yum gyi b+ha ga las phyin ci log tu rnam par zhen cing log par rtogs pas/ brtags pa'i dbang gis srid pa thams cad yum gyi b+ha gar shar bar
390b4(pi): mkhyen nas/ gsang sngags log par spyad pa yis// srid pa gsum po thams cad la/ dregs pas rim pa dbang sgyur ba// dge ba byed pa bar chad bdud// nga rgyal khengs
390b5(pi): pa'i gshin rje dang / zhe sdang dregs po'i ru tra dang / gti mug myos pa'i srin po rnams// sems can kun la dbang tsho ste// srid gsum ma lus rims kyis 'dus// nga rgyal
390b6(pi): dregs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba// gzugs phung che la gdos pa rags// nga ro che zhing gtum bag can// srin po shin tu mi bsrungs ldan// phyin ci log la yid ches pas// mtshan
390b7(pi): ma'i chos la blo rtas te// rang bzhin med pa'i don dang bral// bdag rtog log par rtogs pa yis// srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phags// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong //
391a1(pi): bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'khor// gal te de las par nas kyang // skyur yang srid pa'i lus grangs nas// srin mo chen mo dal spyod// srin mo de mi mtshan
391a2(pi): nyid kyang // zhe sdang 'bar ba'i dngos nyid mtshungs// zhen pa me yis rab tu tshig/ ma mo mkha' 'gro la sogs te// cha lugs du mas bsgyur byas shing // srid gsum dug can dbang du
391a3(pi): sdud// shin tu rngams pa'i 'khor dang bcas// gsod pa'i las la dpa' zhing grims// sha dang khrag la sogs bcad de// de lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa'i srin po dang srin mo chen mo gdul ba'i
391a4(pi): gnas su mkhyen nas// yum gyi mkha' bde ba chen po'i klong nas thig le chen po'i tshul du bzhengs te/ che mchog he ru ka dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig pa phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis par sprul te/ drag po
391a5(pi): nga ro hUM zhes brjod de// sprul pas 'jig rten khams bkang nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa thul bar gyur kyang / srin mo thul par ma gyur te/ yab mngon rdzogs rgyal pos hUM zhes brjod pas/
391a6(pi): srid pa'i dman mo'i tshogs thams cad rang bzhin gyi rnams kyi steng du phrad pas brgyal bar gyur te/ 'khor thams cad brgyal bar mkhyen nas// srin mo nyid dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/ hUM raM hUM la
391a7(pi): ni yo ga ni snyam pa nan/ ces brjod pas/ rang bzhin grub pa mo'i tshogs dang / ye shes brgyal te a ka sha stan nas bting ngo // de ltar bting yang ma thul bar mkhyen nas/ pany+tsa yog
391b1(pi): ni sa ma ya phaT/ ces pas/ jo mo rnams kyang 'byung ba lnga'i rgyal mos mnan pa dang / de yi rjes su srin po kro d+hi shwa ri de nyid spu langs te bred par gyur to// de ltar mkhyen nas de bzhin
391b2(pi): nyid du mu kha le b+ha ga bde klong sa ma ya hUM zhes pas/ 'byung ba lnga yi bdag mo yang yum tshan mo mu kha les brdzis par gyur to// de nas srin mo kro d+haM shwa ris de mthong ba dang / shin tu sngangs
391b3(pi): nas zos te 'dod pa'i khams la dbang sgyur ba'i srin po dang / srin po gzhan dang gnod sbyin mo la thug pa'i bar du dbang du bsdus te gnas so// de nas yab mngon rdzogs rgyal po mkhyen
391b4(pi): bzhin du/ de bzhin nyid mu kha le sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes pas/ yum chen mo'i zhal lnga nas he ru ka lnga 'thon par gyur te/ b+ha ga lnga'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i byang chub sems kyi rgyud las/
391b5(pi): sprul pa tha dad kyis 'khor tha dad dbang du bsdus pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ dpal yak+Sha he ru ka la sogs pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa sprul te btul bas/ 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma 'khor dang
391b6(pi): bcas pa brgyal bar gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sgrol te/ dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po dang 'dod pa khams kyi
391b7(pi): dbang phyug ma btul te 'khor de nyid na gnas so// de'i tshe lha gnod 'dul 'khor de na gnas pa stan las langs/ te/ mgrin pa bteg gnas gdong drang por bltas te thal mo sbyar te/
