392a1(pi): yab mngon rdzogs rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye macom ldan 'das 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma sprul pa dang bcas pa/ gnas tha dad nas 'khor
392a2(pi): tha dad pa dang bcas te 'dus par gyur pa 'di/ thugs rje bskyed du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yum gyi mkha' la yid byed pa po nyid snyoms par zhugs pa las/
392a3(pi): byang chub sems kyi 'od zer rgyun ma chad par bkye ba las/ yum 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrib pa dag par gyur nas/ 'khor thams cad kyang dran pa rnyed de bde bas tshim par
392a4(pi): gyur to// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma nyid sprul pa 'khor dang bcas te// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus te 'di skad ces gsol to// de ring phan chad khyed kyi 'bangs
392a5(pi): sngags kyi bdag por bdag cag gnyis// mthu dbang byin gyis brlab tu gsol// ji ltar 'di dang phyi ma gnyis// bka' rnams 'gro ba'i don bsgrub phyir// gsungs pa bzhin
392a6(pi): du bdag cag bgyid// gal te de ltar ma bgyis na// mgo lus snying yang 'gas gyur cig/ dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po dang // 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma// phyi dus
392a7(pi): rnal 'byor phan gdags phyir// sngan byung sprul pa'i tshul dang ni// phyis 'byung sprul pa'i tshul smos la// khyed gnyis srog dang mon mo rnams// ma lus par ni dus 'di
392b1(pi): smos// de skad bka' stsal thos pa dang // 'dod khams ldum dral 'khor bcas kyis// ston pa'i bka' ni gus par blangs// dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs rje yis//
392b2(pi): phyag rgya bzhi yis dbang du bsdus// thabs dang shes rab gcig pa las// byang chub sems kyi byin brlabs kyis// skad cig de la 'jig rten 'das// zhes gsungs so//
392b3(pi): dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud las/ dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po ji ltar btul ba dang / bde ba thob pa dang / dam bcas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
392b4(pi): / de nas dpal chen po he ru ka yis bka' stsal pa bzhin bya ba dang / phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byod pa bskyang ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i tshul bzung ste/ dpal chen zhabs la phyag 'tshal
392b5(pi): nas/ rang gi srog gi snying po dang dmod mo dus 'dir bzhes su gsol/ de nas dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po dang / 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma 'khor dang bcas pas/
392b6(pi): phyi nang gsang ba'i srog gi snying po dang dmod mo rnam smras pa/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha de ba ma hA kA la kro d+ha hUM dzA dza dza/ oM badz+ra ya kA de ba ma hA pe ta li hUM dzadzaM/ oM ma hA kA la ku da ku ta hUM dzaH
392b7(pi): dza~M/ kang ka khar dza be ta yak+Sha ni dza/ oM ma hA kA la gun hri ta tsU dza hU dza/ mahA kA la arga pra ti dza ye swAhA/ he be du 'bar ma bi du bi sU be du dza dza dzan+tu/ in+d+ra ya mdzam
393a1(pi): mak+Sha mu ta badz+rI ba war k+Sha na ga tsan+da n+ya matam bkal ta le/ ar+tha sa ma pa dza n+tu/ rbad brdeg las dang thun mong rnams// dpa' bo chen po po zhes su/
393a2(pi): gsol// oM ma hA kA la ni thum lam thum ri la rba de/ pu no dza snying la ya/ trag ragrA snying kha rag dza/ ma hA kA la gshog gsha' ma hUM ram kI li kI li a nu shag tshal mA ra ya hUM
393a3(pi): phaT/ oM ma hA kA la hU~M che ge mo zhig aM ku sha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na shre kr-i gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na hUM phaT/ A na ya a na ya hUM phaT/ shri kr-i a na ya shri kr-i a na ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la d+ha ra tsa hU~M phaT/
393a4(pi): / ha na ha na ma hA kA la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ da ha da ha mo hA kA la hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ ts+tshir+N+Na ts+tshin+d+ha ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha ma hA kA la hUM
393a5(pi): phaT/ shwa ba ni mA ra ya/ oM ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la mo hA g+ha mo ha g+ha ya hUM phaT/ ma hA kA la mo hA kA la ya/ ma hA kA la u tsa ta ya hUM phaT/ ro langs chen po dur khrod bdag
393a6(pi): sems can rnams la nad 'bebs shing / srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol// ma hA kA la 'bar ma be du ting krim sha ra ma ti bruM thu/
393a7(pi): myog myog yed yed/ shar ma ti gug ling myos ling sha li ling tsa thun ta b+h+yo bruM bruM myogs myogs shig shig tsit+ta baM shi ra ti rgyob yer/ 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug mas yum dang 'khor
393b1(pi): gyi snying po ma lus pa phul ba/ ma ma trag ragra snying kha rag tsit+ta srog tung dung dza dza hUM/ ma ma trag ra gA la mud tra snying kha rag mo dun b+h+yo dza dza/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ ru ru be ro he tit+ta ba to ser glo snying
393b2(pi): kha rag/ hUM b+h+yo dza dza/ oM tsa pa a shu me sA hA/ au tsa pa la a shu me ar+m+ma pra ti ya swA hA/ trag reg+na ma hi dun b+h+yoHma hA yag+ha tig sna nag mo du na b+h+yo/ ma s+phu la lha dang klu dang
393b3(pi): rgyal po dang / srin po'i 'khor gyis bskor ba ste// ma mo gnod sbyin thun mong du// bskor te bdag srog bskyang phyir du/ de dus bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// bdag gi
393b4(pi): srog nas bskal ba 'di// dpa' bo chen pos pa zhes su gsol// ma raglo thums langs snying rtsa 'dus srog srig srig/ shaM shaM khyer khyer b+h+yo ya/ snying khrag la rtsa srog breng breng
393b5(pi): rbad rbad/ oM dza la dza la hUM phaT/ ma ma srog tug tug khrag la snying rtsa drud/ ma srog thun snying la ma b+h+yo/ ma ra ya b+h+yo phaT/ khrag thun ni dza dza/ nir mi tsi mi sha ku ru ni shi
393b6(pi): skur skur/ dza dza nir mi tsi tsa sri ta ni dzam pa la/ ni nri aM ku sha dza swA hA/ ma ma snying khrag tshal pa dun ting ha la du na b+h+yo b+h+yoHphyi dus skur gnas 'dir brjod nas// bdag gi
393b7(pi): las bcol ma byas na/ chad pa mi zad bdag la 'byung // bdag cig dmod mo 'di lta bus// sems can rnams la nad 'bebs shing // srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod
394a1(pi): pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol// ma mo rang gi snying khrag gis thums rbad/ thang mu le thang mu le tsit+ta rbad rbad/ mug sI mug sni tsat+ta
394a2(pi): nan ra ni rag+ho ni kha la long tsit+ta rbad rbad/ dug sni tsit+ta rbad rbad kyi kha lod kyi kha long tsit+ta rbad rbad/ rtsa sti rtsa sti tsit+ta rbud rbad/ nir sti nir sti tsit+ta mug mug zum
394a3(pi): thum sub su ba tistarbad rba da/ kha 'dar yed yed/ thums thums rba da rba da/ se kha lo mun kha swA hA/ oM tad+ya thA/ ru ru be to ti sta ba to si du ru bi to bad toSh+Tha srang ba sti mA ra
394a4(pi): ya phaT/ ra ragro ma ma dun ting hed ma rked badz+ra ka ru sha rbad/ snying khrag tshal pa rbad gtubs tsit+tar+tha daM myogs mugs rbad/ snying khrag kha la rbad/ tshal pu se na si durbad/
394a5(pi): hur thums srog la ya rbad/ phyi dus bdag gi lus gnad nas/ dbab cing gcad dbab byas na// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang / skad cig yud la 'gum par 'gyur// 'dod
394a6(pi): pa khams kyi gtso mo ni// 'khor dang bcas pas sngags phul ba// oM kur d+ha ra nan/ tsa shi ku ma ra a shud+ha khug mug shi re ma ti khug nyid/ ki li ki li tsa du da ke shu mud nyang ba
394a7(pi): dang tra chum swA hA/ oM she kha ru ru tsi ti a shug me ba ti ru trang kha shal rag mo hUM/ oM sha kha ma mud nyi kha la yan/ ru ru a shu mye s+ye kha te dud ta mA ra ya/ oM ru ru a shu me ni
394b1(pi): dza dza snying long srog rtsa drad rmad rbad/ khrag rtsa rbad rbad/ dbugs kyi ba kyi barbod/ srog breng breng/ rmugs rmugs/ myogs myogs sha rbad/ ma ra ya phaT/ ma ma de sho
394b2(pi): dus snying la yam/ shi ni ku ru thum rbad/ sa ma ya su staM/ khrag ni rba da/ ni ti staM sa ma ya rba da khrig ta ya man+ti shwArbad/ su rag sha rbad/ ba ru ni thibs snying du ma
394b3(pi): bu srog rtsa phrig phrig rbad rba da sod sod nir sti nir sti rbad rba da/ ma ma i sti srog la phyig yaM/ rag sha ma ma ru ru narba da/ hUM mA ra ya rba da/ dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po dang
394b4(pi): 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma 'khor dang bcas pa 'jig rten pa'i tshul bzung nas sngags phul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas dur khrod tshogs kyi
394b5(pi): bdag po dang 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug mas/ mngon rdzogs yab la phyag 'tshal te// phyi dus rnal 'byor don ched du// tshogs bdag 'khor dang bcas pa yi// dkyis
394b6(pi): 'khor cho ga bshad du gsol// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// dur khrod phug gam gang ri 'dab// ni gsum rtse 'am chu 'dus snar// sa bdag la sogs gtor
394b7(pi): ma sbyin// dpal gyi dkyil 'khor lta ba yin// mon mo ske rings mthong ba'i gnas// mi dang stag sha la sogs te// dug dang khrag gis chag chag gdag/ dbus su gru
395a1(pi): gsum sol bas byug/ zla kham dmar po khrag gi tshul// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan// sgo bzhi po la gru bzhi po// rta babs bzhi dang khyams
395a2(pi): ldan bri// rak+ta ra sa ya nar ldan// dbus su kham bu khrag gis byug/ keng rus rul pas mtha' bskor te// zhing chen gur phub zhing phran yol// nal bu pho mo'i rgyal
395a3(pi): mtshan gzugs// mi snying rta sha la sogs te// sna tshogs sha dang 'chi ka'i mtshal// gal phyi rus dang mi dang gtor ma rab tu bya// rtsa ba med pa'i thod pa ru// khrag
395a4(pi): mkhris dug dang shing tog dang // sna tshogs khrag ni 'byor tshad blugs// chu dang myos byed dug sna gsum// de yang gnod pa'i rdzas su sbyar// shing lo rlung khyer sa ma ltung
395a5(pi): mtshan byang tshil chen rA rur gzhug/ byang shar mtshams kyi me nyid la// sreg cing nyungs kar yungs nag gi/ me lha gtor zhing rnam gsum bzlas// shun chen stan du
395a6(pi): ga ding bar bya// shun chen skrag pa de bzhin bgo/ gu gul dud pa rgyun mig cad// zhag dgu bzlas pa tshang bar bya// yid la byang shar sprin nag 'khrug/ snying gtor
395a7(pi): bkang zhing dbang du bsdu// ldan mon pa sog po 'thon// nang grol gtor ma de ru sbyin// bdun na dngos su 'byung bar bsam// 'od dang dri zhim gang byung rung // sha khrag
395b1(pi): lha mo'i gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsis dam pa sre dam yang bskang // ting krim sha re'i drag sngags brdeg/ nga yis bskul ba dbang med du// sngags bdag pho mo sha ru gnan//
395b2(pi): dbu dgu khrag 'dzag snying yang za// 'khor gyis 'gugs shing de la bstim// ling ga 'dar zhing 'gul ba dang // dpal gyi sku bsgoms gsang sngags brdeg/ 'bum phrag
395b3(pi): gcig na gtor ma sbyin// des kyang sod par ma gyur na// pho mo sbags te drag sngags brdeg/ des kyang me la bsreg cing bzlas// re re brgya brgya rdzogs dang bsreg/ yang
395b4(pi): na bsreg thal phyogs bzhir gtor// des kyang nyams pa ma sgrol na// khrag gi maN+Dal gru gsum bya// tha ma rtsa nga mar phur bus bskor// ra thod phag thod khyi thod gsum// gnyan pa'i
395b5(pi): gnas su skyer phur gzugs// dug sna lnga dang shing sna lnga// khrag sna lnga dang ming rus rnams// rtsa ba med pa'i nang du blugs// ma mo'i sngags ni dkar nas bzlas// bdag nyid gnyen
395b6(pi): po'i lha ru ste// bud med nag mo ral pa can// re'u yi 'bo'u rkang la gon// sha tu'i tsit+ta g.yas g.yon thogs// dmar thab dmar la sgrub pa dang // dmar nyid ma mor 'gyur pa dang // de yi
395b7(pi): stobs kyis yul phrogs nas// sha tu sgrol byed za bar bsgom// brgya stong tshad ni tshang bar bya// 'khor rnams gcig tu 'dus 'gyur to// lha gnod mdzes kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
396a1(pi): spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lus la sbrul ltar 'khyud nas gdung ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thog mar rnam par dag pa la// brtags
396a2(pi): pa'i dbang gis 'khor bar 'gyur// de phyir lham rdal g.yog 'khor bcas// sku mdog phyag mtshan bsnyen pa'i thabs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis
396a3(pi): bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// lta ba drod kyi man ngag dang // spyod pa bsgrub pa'i man ngag dang // khyad pa tshogs bdag man ngag gsum// sngags pa gdeng dang ldan
396a4(pi): pa yis// hUM las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// b+h+rUM las gzhal yas 'dab ma brgyad// de ru nyi zla ba chen thogs/ hUM las dur khrod bdag po ni// kha dog nag po cher 'bar ba// dar nag
396a5(pi): gu zu sku la gsol// brjid pa stag gi sham thabs can// smin ma khro gnyer 'bar ba la// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// thod rlon 'phreng bas do shal byas// thod pa skam po'i dbu
396a6(pi): brgyan can// khrag dang zhag gi mchi ma can// dur khrod 'bar bas lus brgyan cing // g.yas na gri gug 'bar ba thogs// g.yon pa thod pa khrag gis bkang // g.yon du 'dod khams gtso mo
396a7(pi): ni// rlung nag 'a tshub ma'i nang shed du// nag mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku// glang chen gyi ni stod g.yogs la// re lde khra bo'i slad g.yogs can// zhing chen gyi ni ya bas bskor// skan g.yas seng ge
396b1(pi): 'tshong ba la// snyan g.yon sbrul nag 'khyud pa ste// spyi gtsug nas ni zla rgyas 'char// lte ba nas ni nyi ma'achar// thod pa tshar gsum sku la klubs// g.yas kyi dang po ral gri thogs// 'og
396b2(pi): ma kha T+wAM rtse gsum pa// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag ba rnams// 'og ma thod pa'i 'phreng ba bgrang // bong bu ga pa phyin phyogs zhon// 'khor ni nag mo 'bum sdes bskor// phyi rim pad+ma dag la ni//
396b3(pi): shar phyogs brgya byin sku mdog dkar// phyag g.yas lcags kyu rdo rje gdengs pa g.yon// shar lho me lha dmar ser te// phyag g.yas g+hun te me dpung thogs// g.yon pa bgrang 'phreng rlung yab
396b4(pi): thogs// lho phyogs gshin rje sku mdog nag/ dbu la mi thod rgyu mas brgyan// phyag g.yas ral gri g.yon dbyug tho// lho nub bden bral dmar nag la// ral gri thod pa g.yas g.yon thogs// nub
396b5(pi): tu rgyu lha sku mdog dmar// sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can// phyag g.yas bum pa sbrul zhags g.yon// nub byang rlung lha dud kha'i mdog/ g.yas pa ba dan sngon po rtse brgyad la// g.yon pa rlung
396b6(pi): gi spro ba thogs// byang du rnam thos sku mdog ldang // phyag g.yas rin chen dbyug zo ste// phyag g.yon nor gyi bum pa thogs// byang shar dbang ldan dmar skya ste// tri shul g.yas la rje chung g.yon//
396b7(pi): steng gi phyogs skyong nyim ni// sku mdog dmar ser phyag gnyis tog/ 'og gis bdag sku mdog sngo// g.yas pa phag rgod mche ba la// g.yon pa khrus kyi bum pa thogs// de ltar lha klu bru
397a1(pi): pos bskor// brgyad dam bco lnga'i nub mo bzhugs// de skar gdeng lnga ldan pa yis// spyi mi gtor ma shar du bzhag/ ma gtor lho ru blun gyis nub// sgyum
397a2(pi): phyed a mr-i tar sbyar ba'i// khrag gi zangs bu byang du bzhag/ tshogs bdag gtor ma dbus su bzhag/ gsung chen me mar kha lnga gtang // shing lo gzugs ni gtor ma'i dbus// phung mo gzun
397a3(pi): ling ga de// lcags sam nag po'i mtshon gyis gdab// lhas dral gnyis kyi lag tu gtad// yungs kar yungs nag thal chen rdzas// lho nub mtsham su gzhag par bya// zag 'thung
397a4(pi): gzugs ma mtshan ldan ma// gcig gam yang na gnyis kyang gzhag/ nam mkha'i lding dang tsa ra dang // shel dang gsum po nag pos bya// nyid kyang dpal gyi cha lugs te// yum dang yab tu bsgom
397a5(pi): par bya// khrag 'thung yab yum gsal ba yis// lcam dral phyogs skyong bcas pa yang // rang gi gling gi nang nas drang // sngags nyid bar ma chad pa dang // de rus rtags rnam 'byung ba ni/
397a6(pi): mon pa nag mosla zhing 'ong // dkar gsum mngar gsum la rdzus bkang // lcags kyi spyang mo ngu zhing drug/ zag sngags rnam gsum rims kyis brdeg/ sprin dga' stug cing thog 'bab na/
397a7(pi): sbyin sreg cho ga rgya cher bya// zhib can dmag gi dpung 'gyed na// 'khor lo drug pa rims kyis bskor// nam mkha' sdug nag 'thibs pa'i tshe// bdud mo shel gyi spyi dkar gyis bkang /
397b1(pi): gnas khang 'khor ram thams cad du// chom sgra che dang chung ba ni// rgyal po 'am ma mo dbang du bsdu// bskrad dang gtor ma byin te bcol// 'tsheg na 'gong po bskrad par bya// chas ngan spang mor
397b2(pi): byung ba na// bskang gso cho ga rgya cher bya// rang nyid nyams ni mi gsal na// phur bu byang chub sems kyis bskang // rang nyid du snying 'dod pa'i tshe// rak+ta khrag gis bkang bar bya// seng seng 'gro snying
397b3(pi): 'dod gyur na// dbang du bsdus te gsal bar bya// 'jigs shing snying na mi dga' na// bdud mo nag mo bya mchu yi// nyams sod yin pas bsgom par bya// 'od dkar byung na rgyal po bslad//
397b4(pi): me thun byung na dam srid nan// bud med bzang mo'i tshogs 'ong na// ma dang sring mor bstan par bya// gdung zhing 'khor la byams pa dang // bu tsha 'tsho bar rab tu bshad// slas dang bran mo grog mo'i tshul
397b5(pi): bu med rang gnod 'khor la brkam// sgra skan byung na tshe nyid sgrub// sgra chen byung na drag po bya// tshub ma dmar nag mthong sleb na// gtor ma byin la dgra la rbad// nam mkha' lding gis bskang
397b6(pi): pabar bya// dri zhim byung na zas skom sgrub// tsa ra rog pos bskang bar bya// lha mo dngos su mthong ba dang // ma dang bu ru dam bcas shing // rang byung bdud rtsi dam yang bsre// mna' bsgag
397b7(pi): las bsgo la sogs bya// bzang ba'i rtags rnams gang byung yang // nye ba yin phyir mnyes pa dang // dbang du bsdus na las rnams 'grub// rkyen dang 'phrad dang ma phrad kyis// rings myur
398a1(pi): gang bde mo nyid gang ba der bsgrub// mthong nas tha tshigs dam bcas pa// dam nyams kyis ni 'jigs pa'i phyir// mgu dang mi mgu med par bsgrug/ mang po
398a2(pi): mdun du the tshom med par bsgrub// ma mo dngos su mthong ba na// kha na ma thor 'gyur srid pas// slob dpon ma gtogs gzhan mi smra// gcig pu grogs kyang med par bsgrub// dbang
398a3(pi): bsdus ting 'dzin gsal ba na// ma mthong na yang 'grub par 'gyur// rgyun du bsrings na the tsom med par 'grub// dbyar ni gang+ga ri g.ya' 'dabs su// dpyid ni chu mdo gangs su// ston/
398a4(pi): ni spang dang 'o bas 'dabs su// dgun ni dur khrod sa phug ba sgrub// gtor ma nam gyi gung la gtang // dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyu las/ tshogs bdag lham dral gyi dkyil 'khor
398a5(pi): bstan pa dang rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos grub yongs su rdzogs pa'i thabs gsungs so// bai ye shes
398a6(pi): las byung ba// gnod sbyin rgyal po nor gyi rgyun// ta na sgrol ba'i lung gis kyang // gnyis su med kho na'i don rtogs kyang // be ye shes las byung ba// gnod sbyin rgyal po nor gyi nun//
398a7(pi): ga na sbyor ba'i lung gis kyang // mi yi thugs dam bskang bar bya// be ye shes las byung ba// chu tshig rkang gi 'khor lo bstan// lta ba zab mo'i don rdzogs bya// 'phrin las dgongs
398b1(pi): spyod tshang bar bya// thun grub rtags kyi tshad phyin pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// dmar la dkar ba chags pa ni// gnyis su med pa'i dngos grub thob// 'od dkar dri zhim
398b2(pi): don byung na// lha dang bcas pa grub pa yin// 'od dmar sbrul du chags pa na// klu dang bcas pa mngon du 'byung // 'od nag dri ma mi zhim na// gnod sbyin 'khor gyis bskor ba
398b3(pi): 'grub// 'od 'khrug snying ni 'phangs mthon// gshin rje 'khor dang ldan pa yin// 'od ldan nus med spu zing ni// bar chod byed pas bzlog par bya// thun khrag khol na sgrib yod
398b4(pi): bshags// 'gul zhing 'dag na pho nya dgyed// khol zhing rlangs byung drag por 'gyur// nag po dug ni mthong ba na// chos kyi dbyings kyi dngos grub thob// dkar na zhi ste ser na
398b5(pi): rgyas// dmar na dbang ste nag na drag/ gang grub kha dog 'byung ba bzhis// 'jam la ring na glu yi sgra// thung la rtsub na bdud kyi sgra// 'chang thung rtsub na gshin rje yin// rtse rtsub
398b6(pi): thung na gnod sbyin nyid// thung cing rtsub na tshogs bdag nyid// 'jam ring mnyen nam mo nyid// dri yi bye brag bshad pa ni// dri zhim 'phro ba lha dang ldan// dri zhim ngad ldan ma mo ste//
398b7(pi): dri mi zhim zhing nyams dga' na// klu la sogs pa yin par bshad// bse dri'i dril sru zing na// de ni bar chad yin par bshad/ de nas 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur
399a1(pi): nas/ tshogs bdag lcam dral la bstod pa/ hUM/ skal ba me ltar 'bar ba yi// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// stobs chen drang srong lha yi gtso//
399a2(pi): rnga ma byed bdud 'dul 'gyi bag can// rngam sgras 'jig rten khams khyab pa// mi thung khro bo 'gying bag can// 'dul byed mche bas bdud dpung 'joms// slar kham pas/
399a3(pi): dug gsum bsreg/ smin ma glog stong bskal pa'i 'brug sgra sgrogs// dbu skra kham nag srid pa'i rtse la 'bar// zod rlon thod skam ra ri skul brgyan pa ni// sku gsung thugs
399a4(pi): dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rtags// bdud kyi ber nag sku la gsol ba ni// chos kyi sku la 'gyur pa med pa'i rtags// zhing lpags rlon pas stod g.yogs byas pa ni// dur khrod gling
399a5(pi): nas ma mo 'du ba'i rtags// stag lpags brjid pa'i sham thabs gsol ba ni// gdug pa'i zhe sdang dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// sbrul nag rigs bzhis sku la brgyan pa ni//
399a6(pi): 'phrin las bzhi la thogs pa med pa'i rtags// g.yas pa gri gug 'bar ba bsnams pa ni// ma rig sgrib pa gtan nas gcod pa'i rtags// g.yon pa thod rlon dmar gyis bkang ba
399a7(pi): bsnams pa ni// srid gsum sha khrag zhal du gsol ba'i rtags// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs pa ni// rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das pa'i rtags// mi ro/
399b1(pi): bo chen steng na bgrad de bzhugs pa ni// lha min g.yul las rgyal ba'i rtags// spyan gsum thad kar gzigs pa ni// khams gsum dge sdig bya ra mdzad pa'i rtags// pa ti khra bo dbul
399b2(pi): bcings pa ni// 'dod khams lha yi gtso mo 'gugs pa'i rtags// bdud dpung 'du la phyir dar nag ru mtshon bsnams// srin po'i grong khyer 'joms phyir lcags kyi tshe 'a brang gsol//
399b3(pi): lha min rdul du rlog phyir tsan dan beng chen bsnams// dgra rnams 'dul phyir mon pa nag por sprul// srig can 'dul phyir khyi nag dom bur sprul// ru tra 'dul phyir dur khrod klong na
399b4(pi): bzhugs// pho nya gtso mdzad dur bya kang ka lding // khrag mtsho'i glong nas srid pa'i ma mo sdud// sde dpon chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong
399b5(pi): dkyil nas// rlung nag 'tshub ma 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// ma cig 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma// bdud kyi yum la gshin rje'i lcam cig ma// nag mo rnam pa'i mche ba
399b6(pi): can// mthing nag gcer bu ral pa can// sku mdog nag mor bzhugs pa ni// don dam dbyings la bskyod pa med pa'i rtags// ral pa g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil pa ni//
399b7(pi): yum gyi mkhal la sprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags// ral pa spyi gtsug gcig tu 'khyil ba ni// skye med don dam gcig tu 'khyil ba'i rtags// ral pa'i gseb nas me stag
400a1(pi): 'bar ba ni// thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags// thod rlon 'bar bas dbul bcings pa ni// thugs rje spu la skus 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags//
400a2(pi): g.yas na seng chen mtshungs med mchong ba ni// dman tho thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// g.yon nas sbrul gyi gdengs ka 'phyo ba ni// zhe sdang ma g.yos dbyings su dag pa'i rtags// snyan
400a3(pi): ma gser gyi tshil bu 'khrol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa'i rtags// spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad pa ni// dgra bgegs thams cad rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags//
400a4(pi): shangs nas khrag gi dri snom pa// dpag tshad brgyad khri gnas nas len pa'i rtags// zhal ni drag po'i hom khung gdengs pa de// dam nyams dgra bo zhal du rngub pa'i rtags// rno dug
400a5(pi): mche ba zur gsum gtsigs pa ni// dgra bgegs sha la chem chem gsol ba'i rtags// thugs rjes chags pa'i rtags su rat+ti'i thi les brgyan// don dam bcud kyi rtags su zhag gi zo ris
400a6(pi): can// 'dul byed 'phrin las rtags su thal chen mtshan ma btag/ zhing lpags rlon pa sku la gsol ba ni// chos nyid yang dag don dang ldan pa'i rtags// glang chen ko rlon spyod
400a7(pi): g.yogs gnam phyed dkris pa ni// theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan pa'i rtags// re lde nag pos gnam phyed dkris pa ni// 'jig rten 'di na che btsan ldan pa'i rtags// lte ba'i dkyil
400b1(pi): nas nyi ma 'char ba ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ma lus skems pa'i rtags// lcags slog 'bar bas zhabs la dkris pa ni// 'dod khams 'dul ba'i dbang dang ldan pa'i rtags// gsas
400b2(pi): na shang lang nag po bsnams pa ni// sdug bsngal skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// 'og na thod rlon 'phreng ba bsnams pa ni// thugs rjes 'khor ba'i gnas nas 'dzin pa'i rtags
400b3(pi): g.yon pa tri shul rtse gsum bsnams pa ni// dam nyams khams gsum rdul du rlog pa'i rtags// 'og na thod rlon dmar gyis bkang ba ni// srid gsum sha khrag zhal du rngub
400b4(pi): pa'i rtags// bong bu nag po phyin phyogs zhon pa ni// gti mug don dam shes rab ldan pa'i rtags// srin po'i o ga mas sgra ru byas pa ni// bdud dang srin po zil gyi
400b5(pi): gnon pa'i rtags// sbrul nag chun pos gong rmed byas pa ni// zhe sdang dbang gis dgra dpung 'joms pa'i rtags// ru sbal nag po'i pho bus brgyan pa ni// klu rigs thams
400b6(pi): cad dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// bdud kyi khram bam snga shar btags pa ni// dam nyams gang yin khram la 'debs pa'i rtags// nad kyi rkyargyal pa phyi shar bkal ba ni// dkon
400b7(pi): mchog dbu 'phangs smod pa'i dgra bo la// nad ka chen po 'bebs pa'i rtags// ma mo 'bum phrag bran du 'khol ba ni// bstan pa bshig pa'i dgra la dmag dpung 'dren/
401a1(pi): ma bdud 'bum phrag pho nyan da khye la// dbu 'phangs smod pa'i nyams pa khrid las shog/ ma cig me 'bar kha nas rgya mtsho skems// ma cig lag
401a2(pi): na rdo 'phen ri rab bsgril// ma cig ral pa mun+da nag stong khams khebs// kha na mi sha rlon pa za// khrag dang zhag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil// dpal chen bu mo da tshur spyon/
401a3(pi): bdag gis btsun par khyod bstod kyis// ma cig lha mo da tshur spyon// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud las/ stan 'gas
401a4(pi): na'i rtags brtan pa dang lcam dral la bstod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yum 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug mas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal
401a5(pi): nas/ yak+Sha kro d+hi shwa ri ma'i cha lugs bzung nas g.yon phyogs su gnas te/ gar byed cing dam du 'khyud pa dang // 'chor ba dang / 'o byed pa dang / ling ga la rol par byed cing ched du brjod
401a6(pi): do// e maho thugs rje chen po'i bdag/ bdag kyang bsod nams skal bar ldan// snyoms 'jug dbang gis mya ngan 'das// bye dus bstan pa bzung ba'i phyir// 'das dang
401a7(pi): ma 'das tshul bzung nas// lha srin sde brgyad dbang bsdus te// srid gsum nyam chung bde spyod cing // bstan pa bshig pa bsgral bar bgyi'o// zhes brjod do// bde ba dang ldan
401b1(pi): nas rang gis mthong ba'i don la mi g.yeng bar rtog go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru kas rdo rje gsang lam du hUM/ dges pa'i 'phro 'du b+ha gar thim// gsang ba rgyas pas
401b2(pi): 'jig rten khams// rag chags pas g.yos par gyur// dbang gi rdo rje gyur pa rnams// rtsa ba bteg ste yig gnas nas// kun nas rdo rje gnas su 'dus// 'jig
401b3(pi): rten mi la sman rmad du// thams cad spyi dpal yab yum la// nag mo la sogs 'dod khams kyi// lha srin sde brgyad yak+Sha bdud// yum chen spyan gzigs yab la bskul//
401b4(pi): yab kyis gnod 'dul stan las rab langs nas// bskor ba brgya phrag stong du byas// gus pa'i tshul du mdun du ni// pus btsugs thal mo rab sbyar nas// bcom ldan 'das la
401b5(pi): 'di skad gsol// yab kyi dgongs pa ji lta bu// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// bsnyen pa'i cho ga sngon bzhin las// gzas zin nya'am mar ngo la// 'gro
401b6(pi): lo drug pa'i cho ga dang // srin mo thun gyis gsad pa brtsam// gtor ma byin la las rnams bcol// gdug pa'i bar chad spang ba'i phyir// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg par der brtsam//
401b7(pi): bdag rtog log rtog can la ni// dgug pa las kyi cho ga ni// glang ngam mdze mo'i pags pa la// nag po'i zhal ni legs bris la// bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro rtsa yis// dbus su
402a1(pi): 'khor lo brgyad bris te// phya rim bcu drug rtsibs dang ldan// rnga mo'i steng na gnas pa ste// phyi rol thod pa lcags kyi 'phreng ba dag dang ldan// dug/
402a2(pi): dang b+ha ga khrag thal gsum gyis ming rus bris// byang shar mtshams su kha bltas la// khri phrag gcig tu bar mi gcad// sha tu bkug nas 'ong bar bsam// oM ma hA kA la
402a3(pi): hUM tri thun ma tI tri sha ku ru ni A kaR+Sha ni hU~M dza dza hI hUM phaT/ dbye ba las kyi cho ga ni// dur khrod ras dang gri khrag gis// nag po'i zhal ni bri bar bya// lug dang spyang khu steng na gnas
402a4(pi): bya rog 'ug pa'i bar du gzhug/ 'khor lo rtsi bso ni bcu gnyis la// bya rog khrag gis ming rus bri// lcags phye yungs kar shang tshes brab// phyi rol 'khor lo mtshon chas dgang //
402a5(pi): oM ru lu ru lu tsakrarbad// kha la kha la ma tri dum rbad/ che ge mo pra shag du na tring mA ra ya phaT/ lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// bya rog 'ug pa'i dang rus brjeg/ de yis dbye
402a6(pi): bya so sor 'gro// lung dang sbyang ku gzugs mthong bas// de yis shin tu sod par byed// khri khri bar ma chad par brdeg/ shin tu bskrad pa'i las bya na// mya
402a7(pi): 'am dur khrod ras ma la// b+ha ga khrag gis rab spangs la// rtsibs dgu'i 'khor lo bri// rta dang ma he'i steng na gnas// rta khrag dug gis legs bris la// oM sha
402b1(pi): ni sha ni tsag tra rbad/ muk+ki thing rbad/ che ge mo u tsa ta ya dam paT/ lho nub mtshams su kha bltas la// khri khri bar ma chad par bzlas// shin tu bsreg pa'i las bya na// ro ras
402b2(pi): sam ni zhing lpags la// dri bo'i khrag gis legs mtshan te// nag po'i zhal ni bri bar bya// mkhas pas me yi steng na gnas// tsha ba gsum dang la phug shing // 'khor
402b3(pi): lo bcu drug bri bar bya// shin tu ming rus dug gis bri// oM dz+wa la raM dz+wa la raM sha ni had+ha ru su ru nI pa tsa pa tsa ni// yag+na kA la dza la raM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ shar lho mtshams su
402b4(pi): kha bltas la// khri khri bar ma chad par brdeg/ la phug nim pa me la bdug/ shin tu gsad pa'i las bya na// dri bo dag gi pags pa la// nag po'i zhal ni bri bar bya//
402b5(pi): bya rog 'ug pa'i sgo rtsa 'am// de yi lag pa'i rus pa mchog/ rtsibs bcu pa yi 'khor lo bri// dug dang khu ba ba khrag gis// shin tu ming rus bri bar bya// drag po
402b6(pi): e yi dbus su bzhugs// lcags sam nag po'i phur pas brdeg/ kyo 'dra ma dung dang ral gris gtubs// oM ma hA kA la tsakra kA la ban+d+ha thum bu ra ti ku ru rbad rbad phaT/
402b7(pi): byang gi phyogs su kha bltas la// khri khri bar ma chad par bzlas// gnan pa las kyi cho ga ni// nal bu pho mo'i pags pa la// nag po'i zhal ni bri bar bya// 'khor
403a1(pi): lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis la// shin tu gzugs dang ming rus bri// phyi rol zlum po sbrul dang ni// rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya// oM ma hA kA la
403a2(pi): ha na ha na nA sha ya nA sha ya che ge mo stam+b+ha ni stam+b+ha ni mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas la// khri khro bar ma chad par bzlas// byang lta'i chu mig lkugs pa ru/
403a3(pi): sa bdag ma mo mdun sar gnan// spogs pa las kyi cho ga ni// nag po stong za dkyil 'khor du// thod pa gsum gsum dgu yis bskor// rol gri spu gris thams
403a4(pi): bskor// dum bu drug pa'i thod pa ru// dug gi ma mo bskyed cing bsgrub// tsha ba'i rdzas dang til mar khrag/ rdo gsum phyed dang yungs kar la// sU gri dzag sngags
403a5(pi): tshar bcad gsad// oM shrI ma hA kA la gu na hri da hUM tsakra rbad yaM yau snying yaM/ tri ma kha thun snying la tsi tra ru ru ti sta rbad sod ri la yam khram pa ti b+h+yo/ tsig tsi ga ya ma yaM dud tri rbad tri
403a6(pi): skor ba kham rbad// nya nas nyi shu gnyis la gnan// dang po phyogs su gtor byas na// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// tsit+ta dang
403a7(pi): ni rak+ta dang // btsan du g.yungs kar zhungs nag la// byang shar mtshams kyi khung bu ru/ shin tu bkug ste de la bstim// ru ru shig+ha tri ma du sod/ srog thu thu sod
403b1(pi): ma rag du sod/ kha rug sha ma sod/ srog thu ni sod/ nir ya ni ya tsa tsu ni sod/ sha rgyu snying phyung / snying rgyu srog sod/ srog rgyu dbugs long / ma mo thu thu thod/ tsa thun
403b2(pi): mA ra ya sod/ shag thun mA ra ya thun sod/ ru ru ra mA ra ya thun sod/ ma ma mug+ni g+hi na thun song/ ma ma shag thun ting thun song/ ma ma rbad mA ra ya sod/ shag sha ga raglo thun song/
403b3(pi): nya dang tshes brgyad dus su gtor ma sbyin// bzlog gtor mi bsdu mo 'phrul 'byung dus gtang // dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud las/ dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag
403b4(pi): po ldum dral 'khor lo bskor ba dang drag sngags thun gyis gsad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas lha gnod 'dul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
403b5(pi): skad ces gsol to// yab kyi dgongs pa ji lta bu// dur khrod bdag po lcam jal gyi// thog ser ltas ngan ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//
403b6(pi): mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// dben la dga' ba'i gnas nyid du// mtshams bcad mtho gzugs gtor ma gtang // maN+Dal gru bzhi khrag gis byug/ gru gsum
403b7(pi): mthing nag zla kham gsum// gru bzhi gru chad ldan par bri// dri bo pho mo'i thod pa ru// rA snying phag snying spyang snying dang // ra ro lag pa khra bo'i khrag/ bya mo nag mo'i sgo nga dang /
404a1(pi): bdud rtsi lnga dang phur thal dang // chang dang sbyar la mo thong thugs// mi dbang rnam lnga 'bras ni so bar sbyar la ri lus bya/ nal bu'i rgyu la mtshan
404a2(pi): dag la lcam dral sku'ang bri/ dri bo pho mo thod pa kha sbyar la/ rdo sol gyis ya bri/ rang sngags kyis bskor/ nang du gtor ma dang / ri lu dang / yul de'i sngo sna ming
404a3(pi): dbyibs dang / nya lcibs rdo rjeg rnams thugs la rgyu mas bcings la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgrub/ bar bar du dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po dang gza' dang rgyu skar gyi
404a4(pi): bdag po bskyed la/ shin tu yul khams su ser ba phob cig par bsgo/ nag mo re ma tis ston zla gsum la lcags kyi ser ba ri rdib pa tsam phob cig par bsgo/ drag po gnam lcag
404a5(pi): kyi zor ba dang 'phrab shing zangs kyi skon tse la/ rta nag dang dre'u nag mdzon ga la bkal bas/ kho yi yul bkang nas lo thog 'joms par bsams la 'dzab bya/ oM ma hA kA la
404a6(pi): ku na hri da hUM dza/ tshom rol tshom rol shar shar sil sil thar thar raM raM n+yo b+h+yo gyu gyu dul nal dul nal swA hA/ na hi sa da ya re tsa li sad ya bi kur ti bal po ba la ka/ bye ma
404a7(pi): la kha d+ha raM ru ru sha sha shu shu dzu ba le dum pa le na ga le na ga le/ me bu ma pu na ka na ka ta ka ta ki hUM phaT/ ma ma b+h+yo ru ru sa ma ya s+t+waM dza ya du ma dum du ya rga mas trag
404b1(pi): ragrA b+h+yor g+ho dun b+h+yo ti sta rbad khrag la ya sar sar ser ser thum ril sa ma ya lo thog cho ma thog thob/ trag rag+ha ru khu ru lu trang du so ti snying tse ru na du na khran d+ha wan d+ha che ge/
404b2(pi): mo'i lo thog la b+h+yo mA ra ya tig sna tig sna bur bu ra lo thog la b+h+yo ya ra pa tsa pa tsa tshal pa tshal pa lo tog b+h+yo ya ra/ dgun gyi dus na kha ba bu yug tshub rtags yin/ lug dang bud
404b3(pi): med spyi rtags yon/ de byung na thod pa'i sku'am ske mgor sra/ las dang bor gyi dus su rgyal mtshan rngab/ gsang ba'i rdzas bzhi sbyin sreg tu gtang
404b4(pi): ltas ngan skar ma wa'i nub mo byi la dang spyang khu spre'u wa gla ba dang lnga po thod du blugs/ srin bya 'ug pa pho rog gsum gyi sha dang gzugs mo thod du blugs/ dar
404b5(pi): mthing nag gi sa gur dbug/ skud pa dkar nag gis bcings la skar ma sa ri'i nub mo rba da/ ma hA kA la trag tshi la ra khri ru ru raM ya rdzas sprugs/ da na krig
404b6(pi): ru ru ra glo a shu yaM/ thun tri rag+ho kha la tsa tsa sbugs/ stong bzlas la dgra phyogs su 'phangadangos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud las/
404b7(pi): dur khrod bdag po lcam rdal gyis ser ba dbab pa dang ltas ngan gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang lha gnod 'dul gyis/ mngon rdzogs yab
405a1(pi): 'di skad gsol to// dur khrod bdag po lham dral gyis nor bsgrub pa dngos grub blang ba'i thabs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/
405a2(pi): stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// bkra shis yid 'ong gnas de ru// maN+Dal zlum po dri yi thig les byug/ gser dngul rin chen bum pa ru// 'bru
405a3(pi): dang rin chen sna tshogs blugs// 'dza gad phud dang shing 'bras thugs// a dkar po las lcam dral bskyed de// dngos grub gang 'dod yi ge gdags// oM ma hA kA la rat+na
405a4(pi): gi ru a mu ka sid+hi a sho sha ni sho sha ma ni si a ru ru ti sta ba to si a ru bag sha a/ stong bzlas shing dngos grub blang ngo // dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud las
405a5(pi): lha gnod 'dul lcam dral gyis nor bsgrub pa dang phan gdags pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dpa' bo la// gnod mdzes lha yis 'di
405a6(pi): skad gsol// ro langs dur khrod bdag po yi// gsang ba sngags kyi 'phreng ba mchog/ phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi tshul// srog nas drang zhing snying bskyang phyir//
405a7(pi): bsnyen pa sngags kyi cho ga mchog/ dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// phyi tshul lha yi
405b1(pi): dmag dpon byed// nang ni srin po'i srog la rngam// gsang ba bdud po snying la rol// de yi gsang sngags 'di dag go/ ka kha ga g+hang tsa tsha dza dz+ha&/ TaN DaD+D+h+ya NA/
405b2(pi): ta thA da d+ha na/ ba pha ba b+h+ram/ ya ra la wa shaSha sa hak+Sha/ a U/ aM I/ u U/ rarA wAM/ a aM/ o au/ aM a/ de nas nag po chen
405b3(pi): po ni// phyi tshul dbyangs yig bcu bzhi la// lnga pa'i lnga pas steng du brgyan// kun gyi thog mar brjod pa'o// lnga pa'i gsum pa bzung ba la// sde tshan gnyis
405b4(pi): pa'i gsum pa la// drug pa'i gnyis po 'og tu bsnyad// sde tshan drug pa'i dang po la// dang po yi ni gsum pa gzhag/ bdun pa yi ni tha ma bzung // gsum pa'i
405b5(pi): bzhi pa bzung ba la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig steng du brgyan// lnga ba yi ni bzhi pa bzung // lnga pa'i lnga pa bzung ba la// bdun pa yi ni bzhi par brjod// dang
405b6(pi): po yi ni dang po dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa gsung // dang po'i dang po bzung ba la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og tu bsnyad// dbyangs yig bcu gsum steng
405b7(pi): du brgyan// gsum pa yi ni dang po bzung // bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig drug pas 'og tu brgyan// dang po'i lnga pas steng du mdzes// sde tshan
406a1(pi): gnyis pa'i gsum bral// dbyangs yig bcu gsus steng du brgyan// gsum pa mini dang po bzung // bdun pa yin bzhipa la/
406a2(pi): byangs mig drug pas 'og tu brgyan// dang po'i lnga pas steng du mdzes// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la/ dbyangs yig
406a3(pi): gnyis pas 'og tu bslad// bskab ste gsum du brjod pa nI// yab kyi snying nas rung ba'o// dang por rnam par snang mdzod bzha// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa
406a4(pi): gzung // drug pa yin gnyis pas bskyed// drug pa'i dang po gzung ba la// dang po ye nI gsum pa bzhag/ bdun pa yi ni lnga pa gzung // gsum pa yi ni
406a5(pi): bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig steng du brgyan// lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa gzung // lnga pa yi ni lnga pa brjod// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa gzung // lnga pa yi ni dang po la/
406a6(pi): dbyangs yig bcu gcig steng du brgyan// bzhi pa yi ni dang po gzung // drug pa yi ni gsum pa la// dbyangs yig bcu pas steng du brgyan// bdun pa yi ni
406a7(pi): bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig drug pas 'og tu brgyan// dang po'i lnga pas steng du mdzes// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gnyis pas 'og tu
406b1(pi): brgyan// lan gsum brjod pas yum gyi yin// dang por rnam par snang mdzad gzhag/ lnga pa'i lnga pa bzung ba la// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa gzhag/ dang po yi ni dang /
406b2(pi): po dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa gzhag/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa bzung ba la// dang po yi ni gsum pa gzhag/ dbyangs yig drug pas 'og tu bskad// gsum
406b3(pi): pa yi ni lnga pa gzung // bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// drug pa yi ni gnyis pa bskad// dbyangs yig dgu pas steng du brgyan// gsum pa'i bzhi pa gzung ba dang //
406b4(pi): bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig drug pas 'og tu brgyan// dang po'i lnga pas mdzes pa'o// gnyis pa'i gsum pa gzung ba la// dbyangs yig gnyis pas
406b5(pi): 'og tu bskrad// dur khrod bdag po nang gi yin// bzhi pa'i dang po bzung ba la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og tu bsnyad// dang po yi ni gsum pa gzhag/ drug pa'i gnyis
406b6(pi): bapa bzung ba dang // dang po yi ni gsum pa bzhag/ bdun pa yi ni dang po bzung // gsum pa yi ni bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig steng du brgyan// lnga pa'i gsum pa bzung ba la// dbyang
406b7(pi): yig gsum pas steng du brgyan// lnga pa'i lnga pa bzung ba la// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa bzung // dang po yi ni dang po bzung // drug pa yi ni gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gsum pas steng du
407a1(pi): brgyan/ drug pa'i dang po bzung ba la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig steng du brgyan// lnga pa'i bzhi pa bzung ba la// drug pa'i dang po phyin phyogs
407a2(pi): brgyan/ dbyangs yig bcu gsum steng mdzes pa'o// gnyis pa'i gsum pa bzung ba dang // 'chang dang 'khyud pa yum gyi yin// thog mar rnam par snang mdzad
407a3(pi): bzhag/ bdun pa'i bzhi pa bzung ba la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig steng du brgyan// lnga pa'i bzhi pa bzung ba la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig steng du brgya ni/ bzhi

407a5(pi): lnga pa'i lnga pa bzung ba dang // lnga pa'i gsum pa bzung ba la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig steng du brgyan// bzhi pa'i gsum pa bzung ba la// dbyangs yig lnga pas 'og tu
407a6(pi): brgyan// dbyangs yig gnyis pa bzung ba la// lnga pa yin gsum pa bzhag/ dbyangs yig bzhi pas steng du brgyan// bdun pa'i gsum pa bzung ba la// bzhi pa yi
407a7(pi): ni lnga pas bsnyad// dbyangs yig lnga pas 'og tu brgyan// lnga pa'i gsum pa bzung ba yi// dbyangs yig bcu gtsog steng du brgyan// bzhi pa'i gsum pa bzung ba dang /
407b1(pi): dbyangs yig lnga pas 'og tu brgyan// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gnyis pas bsnyad pa gnyis su brjod// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig drug
407b2(pi): pas 'og tu brgyan// dang po lnga pas steng du mdzes// dur khrod ba dag po gsang ba'i sngags// dang por rnam par snang mdzad bzhag/ lnga pa'i gsum pa bzung ba dang // gnyis
407b3(pi): pa'i gsum pa bzung ba la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og tu bsnyad// bdun pa'i gsum pa bzung ba la// gnyis pa yi ni lnga pa bsnyad// dbyangs yig bzhi pas steng du brgyan//

407b5(pi): yig bcu gcig steng du brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po bzung // drug pa'i gnyis pa bzung ba la// dang po yi ni gsum pa bzhag/ lnga pa'i lnga pa bzung ba la// dbyangs

407b7(pi): gnyis pa'i gsum pa lan gnyis brjod// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa bzung // dbyangs yig drug pas 'og tu brgyan// dang po'i lnga pa steng du mdzes// gcer bu bong zhon
408a1(pi): gsang ba'i sngags// de nas nag po chen po ni// 'jig rten tshul du sku sprul nas// rngam pa stag gi gdan can gyi// de nyid bsgrub pa'i snying po
408a2(pi): 'di/ dang por rnam par snang mdzad bzhag/ bdun pa'i dang po bzung ba dang // sde tshan drug pa'i gnyis pas bsnyad// dbyangs yig gsum pas steng du brgyan// lnga

408a7(pi): bsnams// kham nag skra yang gyen du brdzes// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi bzung ba la// lnga pa'i lnga pas steng du brgyan// bdun pa'i dang po bzung ba la// drug pa'i gnyis
408b1(pi): pas 'og tu bsnyad// dbyangs yig gsum pas steng du brgyan// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa bzung // bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // dang po yi ni dang por bzung // drug pa yi ni

408b3(pi): pa yi ni lnga pa bzhag/ gnyis pa'i gsum pa bzung ba ni// gsod byed 'jig rten pa yin no// dur khrod bdag po chen po ni// drag la mthu rtsa la drag ldan pa'i// mtshon
408b4(pi): cha 'khor lo bskor ba yi// seng ge sha la rub pa bzhin// lnga pa'i lnga pa bzung ba dang // de nas bdun pa'i bzhi pa bzung // dang po yi ni dang po bzung // de nas drug

408b7(pi): dbyangs yi go lnga pas 'og tu brgyan// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa bzhag/ drug pa'i gnyis pa bzung ba la// dbyangs yig gsum pas steng du brgyan// drug pa yi ni gsum pa
409a1(pi): bzhag/ drug pa'i gnyis pa bzung ba la// lnga pa'i gsum pa 'og tu bsnyad// bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa bzhag/ lnga pa'i dang po bzung ba la// dbyangs

409b1(pi): dbyangs yig gsum pa'i steng du brgyan// drug pa'i gsum pa bzung ba la// dbyangs yig gnyis pas 'og tu bsnyad// bzhi pa'i gnyis pa bzung ba la// dbyangs yig

410a1(pi): pas steng du brgyun// drug pa yi ni gsum pa bzung // de nas drug pa'i dang po babyug/ dang blo'i gnyis pa bzung ba la// drug pa

410a3(pi): bdun pa yi ni gsum pa bzhag/ drug pa'i gnyis pa bzung ba la// lnga pa'i gsum pa 'og tu bsnyad// bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa bzhag/ dang po'i dang po bzung ba la/

410b1(pi): bzhag/ gong ma bzhin du lan gnyis brjod// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gnyis pas 'og tu brgyan// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // drug pa yi ni gnyis pa
410b2(pi): bzung / drug pa yi ni dang po bzung // bdun pa'i bzhi pa bzung ba la// dbyangs yig drug pas 'og brgyan la// dang po'i lnga pas steng du brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa
410b3(pi): la/ gsum pa yi ni dang po bzhag/ dur khrod bdag po'i gsad pa'i sngags// de nas bdud po nag po ni// bdud ber gser ga tsan dan bang // klang khrag tsit+ta sbed snod par//
410b4(pi): sku la rten te me chen 'bar// srog la rngam pa'i 'khor gsum yang // phag dang rnga mo stag gi mgo/ g.yas pa gsum ka'i phyag mtshan ni// gri khug kha T+wA~M ste leb thogs/
410b5(pi): ge yon pa gsum ka thod pa 'dzin// 'khor gsum bskor ba'i srog gi sngags// mngon rdzogs yab kyi spyan sngar brjod// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi bzung ba la// lnga pa'i
410b6(pi): lnga pas steng du brgyan// bdun pa'i dang po bzung ba la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og tu bsnyad// dbyangs yig gsum pas stang du brgyan// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // bdun
410b7(pi): yini bzhi pa bzung // dang po yi ni dang po dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa bzung // drug pa yi ni gnyis pa la// dbyangs yig lnga pas 'og tu brgyan// lnga pa yi ni dang po bzung //
411a1(pi): bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig drug pas 'og tu brgyun// dang po'i lnga pa steng du bzhag/ lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la// gsum pa yi ni dang
411a2(pi): po bzhag/ nag po bdud kyi srog sngags yin// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa bzung // dang po yi ni dang po dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa bzung //
411a3(pi): drug pa yi ni gnyis pa la// dang po yi ni gnyis pa bzhag/ bdun pa yi ni tha ma bzung // bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa la// dbyangs yig lnga pas 'og tu brgyan// lnga pa'i gsum
411a4(pi): pa bzung ba la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig steng du brgyan// dang po yi ni lnga pa bzhag/ bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la// drug pa'i gnyis pa 'og tu bsnyad// dbyangs yig gsum
411a5(pi): pas steng du brgyan// gnyis pa'i gsum pas bzung ba ni// 'khor gsum gcig tu dril ba'i sngags// nag po gsum gyi snying dang khrag/ gri rgod snying chen ma nyams
411a6(pi): pa/ lcags sngar blugs la ngar nag gcad// ming byang bskor te rbad sngags brdeg/ gong bzhin lu gu rgyud gnyis la// bzhi pa'i gsum pa bzung ba la// bdun
411a7(pi): pa'i bzhi bzung lan gnyis brjod// bzhi pa'i dang po bzung ba la// dbyangs yig gsum pas steng brgyan lo// dang po yi ni dang po bzhag/ bdun pa yi ni gsum pa la//
411b1(pi): bzhi pa'i lnga pa 'og tu bsnyad// bzhi pa'i dang po bzung ba la// drug pa'i gnyis pa 'og tu bsnyad // dang po yi ni gsum pa bzhag/ drug pa yi ni dang po la// dang po yi
411b2(pi): ni gsum pa bzhag/ de nas bdun pa'i tha ma'o// drug pa'i gnyis pa bzung ba la// lnga pa'i gsum pa 'og tu bsnyad// bzhi pa'i gsum pazhag lan gnyis brjod//
411b3(pi): bdud po nag po rbad pa'i sngags// dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud las/ dur khrod bdag po'i phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi sngags dang / bdud po dpon g.yog
411b4(pi): 'khor dang bcas pa'i sngags btu ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// /
411b5(pi): / o D+yan gyi slob dpon thor cog dgu pa dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba be ro tsa na dang / rtsang legs grub kyis bsam yas kyi dkor bsrungs su bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
411b6(pi): rgyu gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn gu d+h+ya dz+nyAn shrI he ru ka ma hA kA pA tsiHshrI ma hA kA la g+han karba tan+ta kA ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan
411b7(pi): 'das gsang ba ye shes kyi khro bo dpal che mchog he ru ke'i sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa/ dpal mi ning nag po'i las rgyud ces bya ba'i/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal
412a1(pi): lo// tha ma g+ha ma Ta/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun bzang che mchog he ru ka chos dbyings skye ba med
412a2(pi): pa'i ngang la snyoms par bzhugs so// de'i tshe yum chen mo kun tu bzang mo gan ma zhal dbyings phyug ma/ rol pa 'gag pa med pa'i ngang la sa bzhengs te/ ya ba la 'di
412a3(pi): skad ces gsol to// kye kye kye/ yab cig kun bzang he ru ka/ dpa' bo dpal chen che ba'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi bde bar gshegs// 'dul byed khrag
412a4(pi): 'thung gar gyi bdag/ rol pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// sprul pa bye ba dpag med 'gyed// 'og min bye ba'i gnas mchog 'dir// nga yi b+ha ga yangs pa 'dir//
412a5(pi): bla med mchog gi bde ba skye// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'phrin las mchog/ sbyor sgrol sprul pa'i dus la bab// sa ma ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ e ho ra ga ya mi/ zhes glu
412a6(pi): blangs te bskul bas/ chos nyid kyi sa ma ti las bzhengs te dgyes pa chen po bskyed nas/ sku gsung thugs las sprul pa bye ba phrag mang po pho nya dang bcas pa bkye nas/
412a7(pi): yum dang gnyis su med par rol pa mdzad do// de'i tshe sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// de'i tshe sku gsung thugs las 'od zer mang po 'jig rten khams
412b1(pi): steng 'og shar lho nub byang la sogs mtshams gang+gA klung gi bye ma thams cad bkang ste/ 'jig rten thams cad 'gul 'gul/ ldeg ldeg/ chem chem/ 'ur 'u ra/ shig
412b2(pi): shig/ yo ma yom/ shar nub lho byang mtha' dbus mtho dman can du g.yos par gyur to// slar 'od zer tshur 'dus par gyur te spyi gtsug tu thim nas/ de nas yab
412b3(pi): yum sbyor mtshams nas 'chol pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad sprul te/ sku gsung thugs nas khro bo 'chol pa gsum sprul to// gzhan yang spyi gtsug nas sku'i mgon po sprul/
412b4(pi): mgrin pa nas gsung gi mgon po sprul/ snying kha nas thugs kyi mgon po sbrul/ lte ba na sa yon tan gyi mgon po spre la/ gsang ba nas 'phrin las kyi mgon po sprul te/
412b5(pi): kun kyang sgyu ma rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i ngang las spyod do// de'i tshe bskal pa dang po'i ru tra gdug pa can rnams sems can la 'tshe bar gyur to// de yang 'di lta ste/
412b6(pi): a kar sha ru tra dang / ma traM ka ru tra dang / klu kha trang ka ru tra ga sum mo// ga zhan yang ba dung ru tra nag po/ srin po ru tra/ gnod sbyin ru tra/ gza' ru tra/ ka tr-i ka rba/
412b7(pi): ma sangs ru tra/ btsan ru tra/ mo rgyud ru tra'o// de rnams kun la gnod cing 'chi bar gyur to// gzhan yang bdud kyi sde tshogs bye ba phrag mang po 'khod
413a1(pi): bar gyur to// de'i tshe yum khro mo gnam zhal mas stan las langs te 'di skad ces gsol to// kye/ kye kye che mchog he ru ka
413a2(pi): thugs rje chen po 'gro ba'i mgon// sems can kun gyi mgon gcig po// 'dul dka' ma lus gdul ba po// dpa' bo bdud dgra 'dul ba po// sangs rgyas bstan pa
413a3(pi): bsrung ba dang // dkon mchog dbu 'phangs bstod pa dang // sems can pa de la 'god pa'i phyir// ru tra bdud kyi dpung tshogs sde// dpa' bo chen po sa 'dul du gso la//
413a4(pi): ces zhus so// dpa' bo yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig ga nam zhal khro mo yum// de don khyod kyis zhus pa lags// sngon tshe 'das dus dang
413a5(pi): po la/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// chos nyid zhi bas mi 'dul ba'i// de tshe bdud dang srin po rnams// khro bo gar gyis
413a6(pi): 'dul bar bya// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can 'phros pas kyang // 'jig rten kun kyang sreg byed de// sangs rgyas thugs rje 'phros pa
413a7(pi): yis/ khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig las sdang rnams bsgral phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal//
413b1(pi): hUM hUM hUM/ oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha shrI he ru ka phaT/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ de'i tshe dpal chen sprul pa rnams dang / ru tra'i bdud rnams stobs 'gran par gyur to// zhal
413b2(pi): gcig phyag gnyis pa dang / zhal gsum phyag drug pa dang / de bu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa dang / dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig phyag bzhi bcu zhe gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sprul pa
413b3(pi): 'gran par gyur to// de'i tshe dpal chen pos snying rjes bsgral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de'i tshe bdud dang ru tra bred de bros so// rgyugs
413b4(pi): phyogs bcu kun tu bros kyang ma thar/ ma la ka'i yul ri ga nam lcag sa ma la ya'i rtser 'dus so// der sde dang dpung dang bcas pa rnams da rung rtsod par 'dod do// de'i tshe
413b5(pi): dpal chen pos thabs kyis ru tra'i sde dpon du sprul nas/ ru tra'i chung ma kro d+hi shwa ri ma la chags/ yid kyis bde bar rol to// de nas ru tra'i chung ma la bu chags te/
413b6(pi): khro bo ljang nag zhal gsum pa cig byung ste/ ru tra'i bu ra brdzus nas phyag drug pa beng thogs pa/ gsang bdag dpal chen dngos kyi ru tra chen pos ma traM mgo la beng brgyab pas
413b7(pi): mgo tshal ba lngar song bar bsgral/ log pa hUM las gzhal yas khang du gyur/ ru dza'i sems nyid gdan du bting nas dam la btags/ ru tra'i 'khor de pho nya rang gi 'khor du
414a1(pi): bkodade'i tshe dpal chen po'i byin rlabs kyis bdud rigs ru tra thams cad btu la/ sku'i mgon pos ka traM ru tra ba tu la/ gsung
414a2(pi): gi mgon pos kha traM ru tra btul/ thugs kyi mgon pos ma tr-i ru tra btul/ yon tan gyi mgon pos pho rgyud ru tra btul/ 'phrin las kyi mgon pos mo rgyud ru tra btul/
414a3(pi): de tshe dpal chen he ru kas// lha srin sde brgyad 'dul ba'i phyir// 'chol pa'i khro rgyal stobs po che// ma hA kA la drag pos te// ma ning mched gsum skra gsung
414a4(pi): thugs/ dpal chen brgyad kyi sprul pas// lha srin sde brgyad la sogs pa'i// bdud sde dpung tshogs 'dul ba'i phyir// yongs rdzogs dpal dgu'i dgongs pa
414a5(pi): skyed/ bde gshegs zhi khre longs rdzogs pa'i// srog snying mthar thug 'di brjod do// lha srin sde brgyad la sogs pa'i// oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/
414a6(pi): ma hA kro b+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya man+ta ka ha na ma tha bany+dza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha ha ya gr-i ba hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra
414a7(pi): kI li kI la ya/ sarba bi ga nan bo hU~M phaT/ oM gu h+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ gu h+ya kro d+ha shwa ri s+t+wa~M/ oM ma hA gu ru sarba sid+d+hi hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/
414b1(pi): oM badz+ra sarba duSh+TA na e dza b+h+yo hUM phaT/ ces bzlas pas srid rtsa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i ru tra rnam gsum dang / sde brgyad la sogs bdud dmag bye ba dung phyur thams cad btul
414b2(pi): lo/ thul lo// tshar bcad do// chod do// la la bsgral te gdan du bting // la la bsgral te rtsig par brtsigs// la la bsgral te thog phub byas/
414b3(pi): la la bsgral te ka bar btsugs// la la bsgral te ka zhur bkos// la la bsgral te ka gdan bting // la la bsgral te dam la btags// e zhes brjod pas/ ru
414b4(pi): tra'i sems las nam mkha' chos 'byung srid// yaM zhes brjod pas/ ma traM sbugs las dam tshig sgron ma srid// r-i zhes brjod pas/ ma traM khrag las ma ma ki ru srid/
414b5(pi): sur ces brjod pas/ sha lpags las sangs rgyas spyan ma srid// ke zhes brjod pas/ keng rus ri rab gru bzhi srid// ro zhes brjod pas/ yum chen gos dkar
414b6(pi): srid/ bruM zhes brjod pas/ khog pa dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang nang gling dgur yod pa/ phyi rin po che'i rtsig pa 'ja' tshon ris su yod pa/ phyi dur khrod thod pa'i
414b7(pi): mkhar chen po rtse mo ltar mi mngon pa/ thod pa skam rlon gyi phag thabs su brtsigs pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ ga na ma lcags kyi gzor btab pa/
415a1(pi): phyogs skyong bcus rtsig par brtsigs pa/ klu rigs bzhi pho mos ka gdan byas pa/ lha chen brgyad kyi ka ba btsugs pa/ gza' chen brgyad kyi
415a2(pi): ka ga zhu byas pa/ rgyu skar rnams kyi dral lca ma byas pa/ ru tra'i pa ga se pa sa thog phub pa/ mi mgo 'i tog gis brgyan pa/ thod tshal gyi dre ba sa spras pa/ tsa tA'i pho
415a3(pi): ltos brgyan pa/ sha chen khrag chen gyi zhal zhal byas pa/ phyi mai rlung 'tshub ma'i klong / nang du ra khrod thod mkhar gyi dbus su/ ru tra kro d+hi sti ra baM/ zhes srid
415a4(pi): ba dag 'dzan gyi ru tra chen po bsnol ba de'i steng du/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la zhes pa nyi ma'i ga dan/ a tsa NA maN+Da la zhes pa zla ba'i ga dan/ paM pad+ma maN+Da la zhes pa pad+ma'i ga dan/
415a5(pi): de'i steng du dpal chen yongs rdzogs che mchog he ru ka nyid/ sku phyag rgya chen po zil gnon cho swa sku longs sku sprul sku gsum gyi ngang las rtsal chen 'phrin las mdzad pa'i
415a6(pi): phyir/ ye shes kyi mgon po ma ning nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas pa 'khor ba'i bdud dmag ru ma bzlog pa'i phyir mtshon mdung ring bsnams pa/ g.yon
415a7(pi): bai ru tra phyung nas zhal du gsol ba/ chos sku longs sku sbrul sku gsum ldan phyir spyan gsum gyen thur thad kar gzigs pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro bo smin mas bsdus shing
415b1(pi): spyan zlog pa/ shangs gnyer ba/ zhal gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ shin tu gtum zhing srog la rngam pa/ chos sku longs sku sprul sku mi 'gyur rdo rje'i mngon
415b2(pi): par byang chub pa lnga gnon pa'i brdar rin po che'i srog zhu lnga yod pa/ a kar ru tra'i thod skam lngas dbu la brgyan pa/ klu kha traM kha ru tra btul nas sbrul nag po'i ral pas brgyan
415b3(pi): ma tA bsgral ba'i tsan dan gyi bang skyed la btsugs pa/ beng gi nang lha dang lha min sde brgyad thams cad 'dul ba'i dmag tshogs bye ba 'gyed pa/ bdud thams cad
415b4(pi): bsgral ba'i mgo snying 'phreng bar brgyus te sku la brgyan pa/ klu thams cad bsgral te sbrul gyi chun por byas pa/ dar nag gi bar gsol ba/ gser ga rin chen skad la bcings pa/
415b5(pi): mi lpags kyi g.yang gzhi stod du bcings pa cig tu sprul te/ de'i zhal nas/ hUM hUM hU~M/ oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ ces brjod pa sa ru tra thul te srog gi snying po/ dz+nyA na
415b6(pi): ma hA kA la/ e g+hi ga g+ha na g+hu ya raM sid+d+hi du beng ni ru pa sarba ho/ zhes mdongs gsol du phul te dam la btags/ bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs/ sa ma ya i tan te na ra kan
415b7(pi): zhes dam sgrags/ ye shes kyi mgon po las mgon mthu'i rtsal che bas srog bdud du dbang bskur ro// dpal chen che mchog he ru ka dngos kyi sprul pa ma ning las rgyud nag po las/
416a1(pi): gleng gzhi'i le'u las ru tra sde gsum bdud dmag dang bcas pa btul ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de'i tshe rig nam lcags ma la
416a2(pi): ya'i rtse ra/ gnas dur khrod thod mkhar 'bar ba'i dbus na/ dpal chen dngos sprul ma hA ka la gsang ba'i khro rgyal stobs po che/ smre brtsegs ma ning 'chol ba'i bu nag po chen
416a3(pi): po la 'khor du gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa byang sems rigs 'dzin gyi tshogs dang / ma hA de ba la sogs pa lha'i 'khor dang / phywa dang dbang phyug chen po dang / mu
416a4(pi): stegs ru tra btul ba'i lhag ma dang / gzhan yang bdud po khram thogs kyi 'khor dang / shan pa gri thogs kyi 'khor dang / nag po zor thogs kyi 'khor dang / nag po mtshon
416a5(pi): thogs kyi 'khor dang / sgrol byed dar thogs kyi 'khor dang / yi dgas 'dre srin gyi 'khor la sogs pa mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe nag po chen po gzi brjid
416a6(pi): kyis nyi ma dang zla ba yang thod mkhar gyi logs la ta la la/ me rlung tshub ma yang thod mkhar gyi rtse la'u ru ru/ dug mtsho khol ma yang thod mkhar gyi rmang na tshi li li/ de'i nang na
416a7(pi): sbrul nag mang po 'khyug pa/ dom nag khyi nag mang po ngu ra ba/ lcags spyang ce spyang mang po 'dur ba/ bya nag mang po 'thib pa/ g.yag rog mang po ngur ba/ rta nag mang po
416b1(pi): 'tshe ra ba/ mon pa pho mo gar byed pa/ ling pas mnga' 'then pa/ bya rog sha 'thog pa/ 'ug parkan 'debs pa/ thun gyi ser ba 'bab pa/ rlung nag tshub ma 'khyil
416b2(pi): ba/ mi lpags g.yab mo g.yob pa/ 'gong po mang po ngu ba/ 'dre ngan mang po skad 'don pa/ de lta bu'i dbus na srog bdud du sprul nas bzhugs so// de'i tshe brang gi sbyin
416b3(pi): gsum gyi steng lha'i srid pa/ 'og klu'i srid pa/ bar mi'i srid pa rnams gzigs pas/ lha dang lha ma yin rnams 'thab pa la/ thugs rje'i 'od zer dbang po brgya byin la
416b4(pi): 'phog pas/ brgya byin mngon par shes te/ dur khrod chen po thod mkhar gyi dbus na ye shes kyi mgon po sprul pa srog bdud chen po de spyan drangs la/ dmag dpon bcol na
416b5(pi): rung snyam nas/ lha ka ra rti ka'i bu mo u ma de ba bya ba spyan 'dren du gtang bas/ thabs kyi spyan 'drongs so// de nas lha rnams kyis chos bzang lha'i mdun sa ra phyag byas/
416b6(pi): / rnam rgyal khang bzangs su mchod pa chen po byas so// shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi rtsar lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag mang pos mchod pa byas so// rdo a mo li ka'i steng du lha'i bu mo bye
416b7(pi): ba phrag mang pos mchod pa byas so// lha'i sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis tshal chen po bzhir mchod pa byas so// mgon po bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis bran byed par khas blangs
417a1(pi): mchod pa chen po yang byas so// der lha rnams kyis dmag dpon du mnga' gsol lo// zas kyang lha'i bdud rtsi gsol lo// lha mo u ma de ba dang
417a2(pi): gnyis ma chags yid kyis rol te/ bu tsha ming sring gnyis skyes te/ bu legs ldan nag po/ bu mo dpal ldan lha mo re ma tir ming ba tags so// de'i tshe ma ning srog bdud
417a3(pi): nag po dmag chas su zhugs te/ phyag gi nya lbu gnyis dang / zhabs kyi byin lU gnyis dang bzhi dang / spyan bzhi las dmag dpon chen po bzhi'o// pra ma rA dza/ ya ma rA
417a4(pi): dzanA ga rA dza/ a ga se rgyal ba rnams sprul to// rta nag po rting dkar la zhon pa/ nyi zla'i zer dang dkar chen gyi 'od 'phrog pa/ stag ra la gzig shugs ga yas g.yon
417a5(pi): la btags pa/ bdud mda' dgra snying gzer zhing gling bzhi yud la bskor ba/ spyan nas khrag 'dzag pa/ zhal nas me 'bar ba/ phyag g.yas gri gug/ g.yon lcags
417a6(pi): par/ kha T+wAM mchan khung du bcug pa/ snang srid kyi pho rgyud thams cad po nyar 'gyed pa/ rtag pa'i khung bu nas khro bo'i spyan gzigs pa/ mtshogs thams cad dmag la
417a7(pi): 'gyed pa/ nyi ma byang shar mtshams kyi gnod sbyin chen po brgyad ni/ lcags kyi bya khra brgyad du sprul nas dgra'i sha khrag la rngam pa/ sngon la 'gro zhing dam tshig nyams pa
417b1(pi): thams cad kyi g.yen pa mdzad cing g.yas kyi phyogs nas lding ba/ lho phyogs kyi gshin rje chen po brgyad ni/ stag gzig dom sbyang khyir sprul nas phyir 'brang zhing byi'i
417b2(pi): dgra bgegs 'dul ba/ lha ma srin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma srin rdul du rlog pa/ gdug pa'i klu chen po brgyad bka' sdod kyi pho nya byed cing kha rlangs nag po sprin 'phung du
417b3(pi): gtibs nas/ g.yu sbrul sngon po brgyad du sprul nas g.yon phyogs nas 'khyug pa/ drag po'i phyogs skyong bcu ni bka' nyan gyi blon po byas te khyi nag dom nag rol du khrid pa/
417b4(pi): lha chen po brgyad ni thugs kyi pho nyar mnga' gsol te/ khye'u chung gdug pa'i mtshon thogs pa brgyad du sprul nas dbu'i 'od las 'phro zhing drag po'i las mdzad pa/ rgyal
417b5(pi): chen bzhi'i ni go mtshon thogs nas ci nyan gyi 'phrin las byed pa/ bdud 'dul gyi dmag tshogs nyi khri chig stong dang chas nas bar snang khams su sprul nas 'thab ste lha ma yin
417b6(pi): gyi g.yul thams cad bzlog ste phung bar byas so// de nas lha ma yin 'pham ste rgya mtsho'i gting du bros nas klu la skyabs su gsol lo// de nas lha rnams
417b7(pi): g.yul las rgyal bas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin shin tu mnyes nas bstod pa/ chos sku skye med kun tu bzang // longs sku che mchog he ru ka/ sprul sku ma ning khro bo'i rgyal//
418a1(pi): gsang bdag chen po stobs po che// 'chol ba'i khro rgyu la srog bdud che// lha rnams bsod nams rgyus mdzad pa'i// lha chen dpal 'bar khyod
418a2(pi): la phyag 'tshal lo// dmag dpon chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sde dpon chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod cing gtang rag gi mchod pa chen po byas so//
418a3(pi): dpal che mchog he ru ka dngos kyi sprul pa dpal mgon ma ning nag po'i las rgyud las/ gleng slang zhing lha yul du sprul nas lha ma yin btul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
418a4(pi): / de nas dpal che mchog he ru ka'i thugs kyi sprul pa gsang ba dag lag na rdo rjes rigs 'dzin rdo rje chos su sku sprul te/ gnas 'og min lcang lo can
418a5(pi): gyi gnas mchog tu/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka la du sa ru tra dang lha min thul ba'i tshe/ yo byad 'jig rten pa'i yo byad dang / lha'i yo byad dang / klu'i yo
418a6(pi): byad dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i yo byad dang / gnod sbyin gyi yo byad dang / dur khrod kyi sha khrag sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po mdzad nas
418a7(pi): gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ bcom ldan gsang bdag he ru ka/ dpal chen yongs rdzogs 'gro ba'i mgon// ru tra tshar bcad bdud 'dul rgyal// gsang ba'i khro rgyal
418b1(pi): stobs par// nyid sprul ma ning 'khor brgyas kyi// dang po ngo bo ngas tshig dang // dbye ba dgos ched pan yon gang // lta ba sgom pa spyod pa gang // dbang dang 'phrin las/
418b2(pi): bskyed rdzogs 'bras bu gang // zhes gsol pas// dpa' bo chen pos bka' sprul pa// nyon cig rigs 'dzin gsang ba'i bdag/ lag na rdo rje
418b3(pi): mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po// de don khyod kyis zhus pa legs// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs yongs rdzogs pa'i// dpal chen dngos
418b4(pi): sprul nag po che// ma ning las rgyud nag po las// phun tshogs lnga 'am bdun bzhi gzung // thog mar ston 'khor gnas su yo byad 'dzom// ngo bo kun khyab byang chub
418b5(pi): sems// de nyid rtogs pa kun bzang he ru ka/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dgongs pa des// ma rtogs ma rig bdag 'dzin ru tra'i rgyud// nges tshig ru tra rnam pa
418b6(pi): gnyis/ rtag pa rang rgyud ru tra dang // chad pa stong tsamA ru tra'o// rtag pa'i ru tra pho mor shar// lha log stong nyid chad pa'o// stong rtsal 'gag rtsal stobs po
418b7(pi): che/ ru tra ma ning 'chol pa'o// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te// rtag pa rgyun gyi ru tra dang // 'khrul pa rang rgyud ru tra dang // thugs rje sprul pa'i ru tra'o// gzhan
419a1(pi): yang du nam pa bdun// sna chen klu chen srin po dang // log sbed can dang mim yin// 'byung po yi dgas la sogs yin// dgos byed
419a2(pi): rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad// de bzhin rigs dang rtag dang chad// sangs rgyas thugs rjes byin rlabs dang // ru tra rjes gzung phan yon bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas
419a3(pi): bstan pa'i bya ba byas// rang mthar thug rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma ning las rgyud nag po las/ snang ba'i skabs phye nas dngos po lnga ru bstan pa'i le'u ste
419a4(pi): gsum pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ ston pa kun bzang he ru ka/ ting 'dzin du mas dbang sgyur
419a5(pi): ba'i/ rgyud don nyams len don ched du// gzhi lam 'bras bu gang ltar lags// zhes gsol bas/ che mchog he ru kas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig khro rgyal
419a6(pi): gsang ba'i bdag/ ma ning las rgyud nag po las// nyams su len cing sgrub 'dod na// thog mar dbang dang ldan pa gces// dbang rnams thob par ma byas shing //
419a7(pi): bla ma mnyes par ma byas na// nyen pa la sogs rtsol ba rnams// 'bras bu med cing rlag par 'gyur// des na dbang thob rab tu gces// 'di la rkyen sbyin bcud
419b1(pi): ldan gces// rkyen ni mtshan nyid drug ldan bla ma gces// rten ni snod ldan slob mas te// snying rje byams ldan shes rab ldan// gtong phod gus ldan bka' mi
419b2(pi): cog/ khog yang gzhung bzang gsang thub cing // blo cha yid gzhung rkyen thub pa// sha tsha snying nye dam ldan gyis// bla ma mtshan ldan dam pa btsal// bu dang chung
419b3(pi): ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad 'bul// ngang bsrings yun du bla ma bsten// thog mar tshogs bsags spyang la 'bad// dus dang tshes grangs
419b4(pi): bzang po la// bla ma slob bu yo byad tshogs la sogs// kun kyang sta gon sngon du 'gro// gsang ba yongs rdzogs dbang po snyan sgrub// mtshams gshegs gang
419b5(pi): bsgo brda phyag dang // dam bca' byin dab ba byin rlabs bdun// bskyed rdzogs gzhung srang tshogs 'khor bya// rtsa ba gsum dang nag po che// thams cad chos
419b6(pi): kyis mnyes par bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang rim rnams// bum pa lha sku yig 'bru dang // phyag mtshan dbu rgyan rten dbang bskur// dug gsum dug lnga sbyor
419b7(pi): slongamabu// khyod par ma ning rdzogs pa'i rmag dbang bskur// sbom mon gyis mchis kyi zhing // mgan pa kyi mnyes par bya// de ltar dbang thob yin tan
420a1(pi): bsam mi khyab// lo ga 'dir na che btsan ldan// zhi rgyas dbang drag bsam pa 'grub// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub thob// bkra shis
420a2(pi): nor 'phel mthu rtsa la che// kun gyi yid 'ong gtsug tu khur// dbang srog dam tshig gi sa gzung ba// bla ma yi dam chos skyong mkha' 'gro ma'i// sku gsung
420a3(pi): thugs rtsa ba'i yan lag dam tshig srung // bla ma'i dam tshig sku mi smad// gsung mi cag cing thugs mi dkrug/ yi dam dam tshig bskyed rdzogs dang // gsung
420a4(pi): gi bzlas pa mi cag cing // dus mchod mi cag rten mi spang // chos skyong dam tshig lta ba yis// rgyas gdab gsol mchod rim pa gces// sgom bzlas rem cing
420a5(pi): phung mi 'bag/ dam rdzas mi ston mi spel cing // rten mchod mi bcing mtshoms gcod rem// nyams pa mi ston bskang mdos bya// DA ki'i dam tshig tshogs 'khor bya//
420a6(pi): rtsa ba gsum po spyi yi dam tshig ni// sgra sen mi breg gdan mi sprug/ ral pa'i rtse mo mi bcad cing // bla ma min par phyag mi btsal// de ltar dam tshig gtsang 'gyur na//
420a7(pi): tshe 'dir bde sgyid phun sum tshogs// phyi ma rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa'i snga ltas ni// sngon la bu dang chung ma 'chi// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung //
420b1(pi): phyi ma rdo rje dmyal gting nas// bskal pa 'bum du thar dus med// de bas dam tshig mchog tu gces// ma ning nag po'i lta ba ni// rang sems stong gsal 'gag
420b2(pi): med la/ bdag 'dzin ye med chad pa'o// kun khyab nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// sgom pa kun khyab he ru ka/ phyag rgya chen po zil gnon sku// rtag pa chen po mi 'gyur
420b3(pi): ba'i/ tshe yi g.yung drud can yin no// spyod pa thabs shes zung 'jug ste// de yang khro ga tu ma sbyor sgrol brtson// sha khrag dmar la spyod pa'o// thabs ni bskyed
420b4(pi): pa'i rim pa ste// aiskye med stong pa'i nam mkha' ni// ma nor ma bcos chos kyi sku// rang bzhin lhan grub ngang gi gsal// oM ma hA shA dz+nyA ta dz+nyA na swa b+ha ba A /
420b5(pi): ma ko&haM/ oM/ 'gag maud snying rje'i sprin tshogs ni// stong gsal kun snang longs spyod rdzogs// snying rjes sems can kun la khyab// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba shud+d+he
420b6(pi): oM/ hUM/ rgyu las kun bskyed yi ge hUM// thams cad 'byung ba'i ngang du shar// gnyis med sprul pa'i skur gsal sgom// hUM e ya ra su keng bru bi sha bi shud+d+he ban+d+ha dz+nyA
420b7(pi): na e tsakra maN+Da la e bruMHru tra kro ti ti ra baM/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Da la/ paM pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/ hUM/ dur khrod thong ma khar me rlung tshub ma'i dkyil 'khor nas// raM baM
421a1(pi): 'jigs keng rus phyogs skyong brtsigs pa'i dbus// rin chen sna lngas 'ja' 'od zang thul 'od du shar// gru chad par khyams sgo bzhi mu khyud bcas//
421a2(pi): 1lte dbus zla gam mthing nag e dbus su// ma traM ru tra chen po bsnol ba'i khri stengs na// hUM la sa me 'od rdo rje tsha tsha skar ltar 'phro// 'phros pa sa stong gsum rab 'byams
421a3(pi): brtsegs pa'i ga dan// he ru ka dpal 'jigs pa'i sku// ma ning nag po khro rgyal che// gsang ba'i khro rgyal stobs po che// ma hA kA la dpal 'bar sku// sku mdog
421a4(pi): mthing nag 'jigs pa la// zhal gcig phyag ni genyis pa ste// g.yas na ru mtshon g.yon na snying zhags bsnams// spyan gsum gyen 'thur thad ka re gzigs//
421a5(pi): 'jigs byed khro gnyer gsum ldan gtum zhing rnga ma// sbrul chen 'bar ba'i ral bas sa gzhi khyab// rin chen par kha ba lnga yis dbu la brgyan// thod pa skam po lnga yi
421b1(pi): dbu rgyan can// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dbu la rgyan// sku la dar nag ber chen gsol// gser ga rin chen skad la bcings// mi lpags g.yang gzhis stong du
421b2(pi): g.yogs// de dang gnyis med 'khril ba'i yum chen ni// lha mo u ma de ba zhes// dngos su lha mo dpal 'bar ma// skra mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/
421b3(pi): g.yas na shel gri dkar po bsnams// g.yon na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// gtso bo yab kyi zhal du sto bas// de gnyis thugs las sprul pa'i sras//
421b4(pi): 'chol pa'i khro rgyal srog bdud nag po'i sku// srid gsum gzigs pa'i spyan gsum brang la shar// spyan bzhis lho tshigs brgyan pa'o// zhal nas khrag 'dzag spun
421b5(pi): mig phung por 'bar// rta nag rting dkar chibs su chi bas// stag ral gzig shugs glo la btags// g.yas na gri gug g.yon pa lcags par thogs// lag na
421b6(pi): lcags gzhu bdud mda' bsnams// skad cig yud la gling bzhiru rgyug/ zlog pas mi zlog sngags zlog ma khan gshed byed// tri yaM ru tra hUM b+h+yo/ hUM/ sku las
421b7(pi): sprul pa'i mgon po stag zhon ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mtha' bar gsol// mi mgo 'phreng ba'i do shal can// phyag g.yas beng chen g.yon pa bdud zhags pa//
422a1(pi): chibs su stag chen rngam pa chi bas// oM shrI ma hA kA la ru pa tri yaM hUM dza/ hUM/ gsung las sprul pa'i mgon po bang chen ni// sku mdog
422a2(pi): mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// dar nag sngo khra'i 'jol ber sku la gsol// gser ga'i skye rags sked la bcings// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyel//
422a3(pi): smin mtshams khro gnyer rab tu brjid// spyan gsum sdang mig zhal bgrad pa// mche gtsigs sma ra mun ltar 'thibs// g.yas pa tsan dan beng chen phyag g.yon na/
422a4(pi): lcags bar bdud rtsis bkang ba zhal du gsolo// oM shrI ma hA kA la rag sha du bo ni dza/ thugs kyi mgon po gri gug ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag
422a5(pi): g.yas g.yon gri gug thod khrag bsnams// thod pa'i 'phreng bas dong sha la byas// dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzas// yan lag thung zhing gye la chags pa// lha gzugs
422a6(pi): sbrul gyis rab tu brgyan// zhal nas khrag dang zhag tu 'dzag/ oM badz+ra shrI ma hA kA la k+She ta ha na hUM hUM/ hUM/ yon tan mgon po seng zhon ni// sku mdog mthing nag
422a7(pi): 'jigs pa la// phyag na rin chen thod khrag bsnams// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum dor thabs bgrang // mi mgo rlon pa'i do shal can// mi lpags g.yang gzhi
422b1(pi): sku la gsol// me yi tshub mas brgyan pa po// oM shrI ma hA kA la sing nge ro tsU/ rgyu/ 'phrin las mgon po trag shad ni// sku mdog mun pa'i g.yung drung 'dra// sru la
422b2(pi): dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// phyag g.yas be con 'bar ba bsnams// g.yon pa mi snying zhal du gsol// bskal pa me dpung klong na bzhugs// oM shrI ma hA kA la
422b3(pi): trag shad dza hUM/ gzhan yang sbrul 'khor bye ba sa ya 'bum dang bcas pa bskyed par bya/ de ltar dam tshig bskyed nas ni// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa/
422b4(pi): hUM/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshogs tshur skyon lha chen po// ma hA kA la mthu bo che// ga sang ba'i khro rgyal stobs po che// ma ning nag po kun gyi rje// 'og min
422b5(pi): gnas mchog dam pa nas// gsang chen lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag tu// dur khrod ra ba 'jigs gzhal yas su// mchod phyir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol//
422b6(pi): lha chen dpal 'bar gshegs su gsol// srog bdud chen po gshegs su gsol// legs ldan nag po gshegs su gsol// b+ha ga nag po gshegs su gsol/
422b7(pi): tshogs bdag chen po gshegs su gsol// 'dzam lha nag po gshegs su gsol// nag po che bdud gshegs su gsol// bya rgod thang nag gshegs su gsol/
423a1(pi): nag po thod 'phreng gshegs su gsol// mkha' lding nag po gshegs su gsol// rta ki nug po gshegs su gsol// bdag gi grogs po gsheg
423a2(pi): su gsol// bgegs kyi gnyen po gshegs su gsol// 'gro ba kun bzang gshegs su gsol// sring cig chen mo gshegs su gsol// mkha' 'gro gtso mo gshegs
423a3(pi): su gsol// re ti chen mo gshegs su gsol// e h+ya hi b+ha ga wAn ma hA kA la shrI g+ha na g+hu ya dza dza/ zhes rgya spos la sogs sbyar bas bsreg go/ bzhugs
423a4(pi): su gsol ba ni/ hUM/ dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal yas dam pa 'dir// ru tra pho mo bsgyel ba'i khri stengs su// khro rgyal ma ning 'khor bcas gdan la bzhugs su gsol//
423a5(pi): oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha na gu ya sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM/ chos dbyings skye ba med pa'i pho brang nas// skye ba'i cho 'phrul khro rgyal ma ning sku// mnyam nyid mthu lnga gtum che na me rlung
423a6(pi): 'bar/ ru tra 'joms mdzad bdud dpung thal bar rlog/ thar byed gzhan du 'jigs pa'i gad rgyangs can// ma hA kA la khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes mkha' 'dra
423a7(pi): sngon po'i mdog tu 'gyur// sku mdog sngo nag dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra// dug gsum mun khams ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i// ma hA kA la khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
423b1(pi): dug gsum rtsa gcod sku gsum lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung // phyi nang par gsum dgra bgegs thal bar rlog/ ma ning mched gsum sku la
423b2(pi): phyag 'tshal lo// tshogs bdag chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// srog bdud chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nag po che bdud sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nag po thod
423b3(pi): 'phreng sku la phyag 'tshal lo// b+ha ga nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// chos skyong chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// ta ki nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// klu bdud nag
423b4(pi): po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// gza' bdud nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// shar gyi nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra gshing chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo//
423b5(pi): dzam lho nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bgegs kyi gnyen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gi grogs po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// dam can chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal
423b6(pi): lo// gtsug leg khang skyong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ser chags dgra lha khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor dpal mgon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dug gsum sman
423b7(pi): pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs 'dzin srog shing khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bstan pa'i mnga' bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
424a1(pi): mgon po sde lnga'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// lha srin sde brgyad che la phyag 'tshal lo// srid cig chen mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// re ti chen mo'i sku la phyag/
424a2(pi): 'tshal lo// bdud 'dul nyi khri chig stong sku la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM/ khyed la mchod pa dbul ba ni// khyed kyi mthun pa'i dam rdzas ni// rnal 'byor 'byor
424a3(pi): pas bsags pa'i thugs dam can// thod can ban d+ha rlon pa'i snod nang du// rgya shugs dza ti a ka ru// gla rtsi shing kun la sogs pa// dri zhim spros lnga tu lu lu// ga
424a4(pi): bu ra la sogs sman lnga chi li li// 'bru bcud dza ga da gser skyems brengs sa brengs// rak+ta dmar che na arga khyi li li// ban d+ha rus pa'i tshogs ni khro lo lo// sha chen
424a5(pi): gsur dud ngad pa tshi li li// bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa brengs sa brengs// b+ha ling gtor ma'i mchod pa ro la se rol// ma hA maM sa la sogs sha sna stong // ma hA tsit+ta la
424a6(pi): sogs snying sna stong // ma hA rag ta la sogs khrag sna stong // go ro tsa na la sogs klad chen stong // ba su ta dang nang khrol rnam pa lnga// shing thog me tog 'bru sna sman
424a7(pi): sna dang / zan dang khur ba thug pa'i bye brag dang // khrag ru la nya sha la sogs mthun pa'i kha zas dang // la phug la du yid bzhin 'bras bu'i zas// mar thu do khrem dang
424b1(pi): zho dang 'o mar bcas// rtsi dang rtsa bas ru go skyong sgrog pa dang // gzugs dang sgra dri reg bya chos la sogs// 'dod yon lnga ldan mchod pa dam pa 'di// che mchog he ru
424b2(pi): ka yi thugs dam skongs// dpal mgon ma ning nag po'i thugs dam skongs// sbrul 'khor nyi khri chig stong thugs dam skongs// zhes mchod pa'i rim pa rgyas par bya//
424b3(pi): gzhan yang sman rag gtor ma dang // phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // phyag rgya'i mchod pas bstod pa bya// hUM/ 'jig rten 'das pa'i dus na sngon
424b4(pi): byung ba'i// che mchog he na dpa' sku gsum rdzogs// shrI rtsa bdag 'dzin du tra b+hu gsum brtul// rtsal chen 'phrin las bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// ts+tsha/ dpal chen
424b5(pi): dngos sprul nag po chen po'i sku// 'chol ba'i khro rgyal ma ning dgra bgegs gshed// lha chen dpal 'bar chos skyong yongs kyi rje// dmag dpon chen po'i sku la phyag
424b6(pi): 'tshal ba stong // hUM/ dur khrod thod mkhar me rlung tshub dkyil nas// rnal 'byor dpal mgon khyod kyi cha lugs ni// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa//
424b7(pi): sku gsum ldan phyir spyan gsum gyen 'thur gzigaso// rab 'jigs khro gnyer gsum ldan ga tu ma la rngam// rin chen thod skam lnga yis dbu la brgyan// sbrul nag ral pa
425a1(pi): nag pos sa gzhi khyab// g.yas pa ru mtshon g.yon pa snying zhags bsnams// tsan dan beng chen sked btsugs dmag tshogs 'gyed// thod pa skam
425a2(pi): rnorlon snying 'phreng sbrul chun spras// dar nag ber chen gser ga mi lpags bcings// las la ches tshe srog bdud cha lugs 'dzin// srid gsum gzigs phyir spyan gsum
425a3(pi): brang la shar// dmag dpon bzhi 'gyed spyan bzhis lha tshogs brgyan// stag ra la gzig shugs btags nas rta nag zhon// bdud mda' dgra snying ga zer 'debs
425a4(pi): gling bzhir rgyug/ spyan nas khrag 'dzag me yi kha rlangs 'bar// kha T+wAM gri gug lcags ral thogs nas su// snang srid pho rgyud thams cad pho nyar 'gyed// ci bcol
425a5(pi): las rnams skad cig yud la sgrubs// rtag tu grogs mdzad mgon po nag po ni// ma bskul bar yang gnag pa'i dgra bgegs sgrol// rtag nas spyan bzhi dmag tshogs
425a6(pi): dmag dpung sdud// gar bskul sa ru mi ro tsher mar 'tsher// zlog pas mi zlog sngags zlog mkhan gyi gshad// sde brgyad bran 'khol stag sham mig brgyad can/
425a7(pi): gtsug lag kheng srungs dkor kun rtsad nas chod// dregs pa kun 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzhan yang 'dzab bzlas dngos grub blang zhing 'phrin las bskul/
425b1(pi): gsol ka tshogs mchod rgyun ting rdzogs rim sgom// 'dzab ni spyi 'dzab dgos 'dzab rang rang gzhung // spyi 'dzab che mchog he ru ka'i// snying po ma nor 'di ltar bzlas/
425b2(pi): oM shri ma hA kro d+ha he ru ka hUM phaT/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ dgos 'dzab ma ning snying po ni// chu bo'i gzhung bzhin bzlas gyur na// lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'khor// yon
425b3(pi): tan ming gsum dbang du sdud// khams gsum grol gyis gnon// bkra shis nor 'phel dkor srungs mchog/ oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha na gu ya ra~M sid d+hi hUM/ bye ba them nas
425b4(pi): las kun 'grub// gang bsams pa la thogs pa med// dngos grub ban d+ha ra chang dang bdud rtsir sbyar// sha dmar zas dang dngos grub rdzas rnams bsags/
425b5(pi): hUM/ rang byung gdod nas rnam dag rdzas// 'chi med rang 'byung bdud rtsi'i mchog/ gsang ba yongs rdzogs dngos grub zhu// khams gsum dbang sdud 'gran zla med//
425b6(pi): dpal mgon ma ning chen po'i dngos grub stsol// gzhan gyis mi thu ba mthu che rtsal drug pa'i// ma ning srog bdud chen po'i dngos grub stsol// gsang sngags rgyud 'dzin
425b7(pi): gzhan don lhun grub pa'i// tshe bdud chen po'i dngos grub stsol// 'chi med tshe yi dngos grub stsol// 'dzad med nor gyi dngos grub stsol// 'bru bcud zas kyi dngos
426a1(pi): / grub sgrol// 'phrul med grogs kyi dngos grub stsol// rdzu 'phrul mthu yi dngos grub rtsol// oM AHhUM/ oM mahA kA la g+hA na gu sA ra kA/
426a2(pi): ya sid+d+hi bAk+ka sid+d+hi tsit+ta sid+d+hi sarba sid+d+hi hUM dza/ 'phrin las gsum ste bcas gzhi dmigs pa sngags// nang gdon zhi byed bum pa mtshan ldan ba shams// tshad med bzhi ldan
426a3(pi): skyabs 'gro sems bskyed bya// bden pa'i stobs brjod spyan ras gzigs su gsol// 'od zer dkar po 'phros te gang dmigs de la phog/ rtswa sngags sham du shan+ti
426a4(pi): ku ru gdags// nad gdon rnam rtog zhi bar nges// tshe nor rgyas byed bang mdzod tshad ldan bshams// nang du ma ning tshogs bdag 'dzam lha'i sku// rin chen sna lnga
